description: Includes recruitment offices specialized in bringing in manpower for companies, establishments and individuals and assuming necessary procedures for having their visas issued.
authority: Ministry of Human Resources and Emiratisation

name: Employment Brokerage Office Services
description: Includes third-party recruiters specialized in listing employment vacancies and referring or placing applicants for employment.
authority: Ministry of Human Resources and Emiratisation

name: Medical Manpower Supply
description: Includes offices specialized in supplying medical manpower for governmental and private medical facilities, such offices will provide the sponsorship for the concerned persons, These offices need to be approved by the Department Ministry of Labor to practice this activity
authority: Ministry of Human Resources and Emiratisation

name: On Demand Labors Supply (Temporary Employment)
description: Includes specialized firms engaged in supplying others with different professionals or domestic workers on temporary basis.
authority: Ministry of Human Resources and Emiratisation

name: Tadbeer Center for Domestic Workers Services
description: Includes Tadbeer centers engaged in supplying domestic workers to households, and assuming necessary procedures for bringing them, also, supplying workers to take care of or serving the guests in the personal and corporate events such as weddings, birthdays, mourning gatherings, also involving the provision temporary workers to work within the employer's household, and who perform as cooks, gardeners, housekeepers, laundress, children care.
authority: Ministry of Human Resources and Emiratisation

name: Freelancers’ Services
description: Includes firms engaged in managing and regulating the contractual formalities between freelancers and private and public entities, and enabling new way of work and undergoing all procedures necessary to engage employers to freelancers, provision of training and consultation services to improve their skills and performance, as well as issue certificates to the freelancers to enable them being employed, facilitate agreements between them in a way to work together from distance, including financial formalities, by collecting fees from employers and paying off freelancers.

name: Ladies Haircutting and Hair Dressing
description: Includes ladies salons involved in beautification and hair care, including, hair washing, trimming, setting, dyeing, waving, straightening, hair fixing, henna services, as well as cosmetic treatments, which involve the makeup, skin cleansing, skin hair removal, facial aesthetic, foot care, nail manicures and treatment, micro blading, such firms are allowed to sell the activity-related materials in non-commercial quantities
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Henna Salon
description: Includes ladies salons involved in dyeing women hands with henna.
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Hair Removal Center
description: Includes centers specialized in the removal of the entire hair, including the part below the skin using the epilation methods, and which lasts several days to several weeks and may be achieved by waxing, sugaring, epilation devices or threading…etc.
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Ladies Hair Fixing Center
description: Includes salons involved in fixing human hair for ladies to avoid damaging their natural hair due to continuous hair styling process
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Ladies Cosmetic and Personal Care Center
description: Includes firms dealing with cosmetic treatments for women, including makeup, skin cleansing, skin hair removal, facial aesthetic, foot care, nail manicures and treatment, mud baths, supporting hair strength, strength teeth whitening, It’s not allowed to use this activity to practice massage, also, internal doors should remain unlocked as well as bearing glass to allow revealing the interior of the rooms
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Ladies Oriental Bath
description: Includes firms engaged in providing ladies with sauna type rooms heated by a continuous flow of hot air which allow the bather to perspire freely, and then follow with a full body wash to enable bodies go relaxed and clean, such firms are allowed to sell the activity-related materials in non-commercial quantities.
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Ladies Spa Club
description: Includes firmss specialized in a wide variety of water therapy and relaxing activities for women, such as steam bath, Jacuzzi, sauna, such firms are allowed to sell the activity-related materials in non-commercial quantities
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Makeup, Hairdressing and Henna Services
description: Includes persons engaged in enhancing appearance by applying makeup, hairdressing, dyeing women hands and feet with henna, no haircutting is involved.

name: Nails Manicure and Pedicure
description: Includes firms engaged in the cosmetic beauty treatment for the fingernails and toenails, including using tools to peel and moisturizing the skin and smoothing nails before painting with the required color.

name: Baby Spa
description: Includes firms specialized in a wide variety of water activities that focus on the mental and physical development for infants, babies, toddlers and kids, using pools specially designed for such purpose, it involves swimming classes, water gymnastics, massage, sauna rooms, such firms are allowed to sell the products relevant to the service provision, such as, perfumes and cosmetics, soap and hair care products and baby care requisites in non-bulk quantities

name: Military Women Clothing and Uniforms Tailoring
description: Includes shops engaged in tailoring clothing and uniforms worn by women of the armed forces, police and civil defense.
authority: Ministry of Interior Police clothes, The Ministry of Defense approval is required for army clothes

name: Ladies Wears Tailoring and Embroidery
description: Includes firms engaged in tailoring women and girls’ wearing apparel, such as, gowns, dresses, skirts, blouses, party dresses, wedding dresses, nightdresses, headgear and face cover, such as, veils, hijab, niqab, also, women formal uniforms for school and workwomen in the public and private sector, it excludes military clothing and uniforms, such firms are allowed to sell the activity-related materials, such as, textiles, and garments accessories in non-commercial quantities

name: Ladies Wears Tailoring and Embroidery Workshop
description: Includes shops comprising numerous sewing machines and tailors for sewing ladies apparel, as well as formal uniforms for schools and women workers in public and private sector, except military clothing and uniforms, it also involves knitting and embroidering works.

name: Tanned Leathers Trading
description: Includes reselling of tanned and processed animal leather to render for industrial or any other use.

name: Lawyers and Advocates
description: Includes firms licensed to assume the defense in the cases filed with courts. They also offer consultancy and draw up legal studies of the lawsuits and the legal questions submitted to them.
authority: Legal Administration at the Ruler's Court

name: Legal Consultants
description: Includes offices and firms which offer consultancies and prepare legal studies of the lawsuits and the legal questions submitted thereto. However, they are not entitled to assume the defense before courts in this regard.
authority: Legal Administration at the Ruler's Court

name: Private Notary Public Services
description: They are the services provided by court authorized entities/ agencies to practice the General Notary Public works with limited jurisdiction. These services include authentication of documents, contracts and declarations of all types, attestation of signature of those concerned and the verification of their dates.

name: Dubai Courts Services
description: Includes firms engaged in the registration of all cases, submission of smart cases requests, Inquiry about case, provision of legal translation
authority: Dubai Courts approval - Experience and Arbitration Administration is required

name: Judicial Experience Houses Services
description: Includes the services provided by certified legal persons from companies and houses of expertise, or three or more experts sworn before the Dubai courts, who are ordered by courts or judicial bodies or others to perform a specific task relating to a fact or material fact that require special scientific and technical expertise to examine or evaluate and the provision of opinion.
authority: Dubai Courts approval - Experience and Arbitration Administration is required

name: Compliance Certification For Building Construction Products
description: Includes firms serve as representatives for international organizations and authorities, which issue compliance certificates for materials and products used in Building Construction in accordance to international standards, it also includes inspection, supervision and control of certified factories, which manufacture these products.

name: Quality and Standardization Certificates Issuing Services.
description: includes firms serve as agents to international organizations, which issue quality and standardization certificates to goods and services.

name: Halal Quality and Conformity Certification Services
description: Includes local firms or agents of international organizations and companies specialized in granting or issuing global Halal quality and conformity certification for products and services after conducting the testing and inspection and certification conformity assessment certificates and reports

name: Credit Rating Services
description: Includes specialized bureaus in studying and analyzing the capabilities of the companies to determine their credit worthiness, based on information obtained from the concerned companies or from other reliable sources. Following the evaluation the process involves granting such companies points according to facts found, such firms are not allowed to conduct field surveys and questionnaire before getting approval from the competent authority.

name: Patent and Industrial Property Agent
description: Includes offices specialized in preparing documents, completing legal and technical requirements, making the legal procedures to register patents and industrial designs with the competent bodies and obtaining certificates to this effect issued in return for fixed fees.

name: Trade Marks Registration Agent
description: Includes offices specialized in preparing documents, completing legal and technical requirements and formalities to register trademarks with the competent authorities and obtaining the due certificates.

name: Intellectual Property Registration Agent
description: Includes offices specialized in preparing documents, completing legal and technical requirements and formalities to register intellectual property, which is manifested in artistic forms, with the competent bodies and obtaining the due certificates.

name: Author's Copyrights and Neighboring Rights Collective Management Services
description: Includes firms specialized in protecting authors' copyrights through handling their representation , contract management , collect copyrights proceeds in return of contribution in domain of literature , drama , music , cinema and arts , also , to care for neighboring which involves individuals and corporations that perform and produce the authors intellectual production.

name: Verification of Compliance of Islamic Banking with Shari'a
description: Includes studying and reviewing the transactions of the Islamic banking and financial institutions to ensure compliance with Shari'a, providing Islamic solution to any problem occurs, applying Islamic quality specifications to banking transactions, introducing new Islamic financial products to replace existing bank products as an effort to meet the increasing need for Islamic oriented financial products

name: Trade Mark Verification Services
description: Includes firms specialized in verifying the genuineness of trade marks. This includes detecting imitation, counterfeiting and forgery as well as designs and packs used in marketing.

name: Modified Vehicles’ Conformity Certificate Issuing Services
description: Includes firms authorized by the Emirates Authority for Specifications and Standards to undertake issuing the conformity certificates for the modified vehicles according the standards of quality and standardization approved by the authorizer, on both local and international level, the approval of the competent licensing authorities of said conformity certificates is solely subject to their prevailing traffic regulations and legislations.

name: Patent and Intellectual Property Rights Management
description: Includes firms specialized in managing and promoting patent intellectual property rights issues, following obtaining a proxy from the owner, including buying, owning and selling such rights, as well as conducting the required legal formalities, such as, issue the licenses, , issue the contracts and certificates and sale agreements as per owners’ terms and conditions, also, assessment and pricing formalities as well as intermediary between owners and buyers to reach compromises

name: Barcode Services
description: Includes firms that provide to others global bar-coding for their goods and services, each member’s products are entitled a code, thus they become globally recognized. The system allows for mutual understanding between producers, exporters and costumers worldwide.

name: Documents and Data verification Services
description: Includes firms undertake on behalf of governmental and private institutions screening the documents submitted for employment or otherwise, as well as documents relating to transportation equipment and machinery offered for sale or export or being imported to disclose stolen and fake items, the process involves approaching the sources that issued the documents or equipment manufacturers for accreditation, the documents concerned are education certificates, profession licenses, employment history, registration certificates, import declarations ..etc.

name: Optical Lenses Cutting and Fixing
description: Includes workshops specialized in cutting spectacles and sun glass lenses to fit in frames, also, burnishing and fitting with special features such as anti-glaring.

name: Spectacles Repair
description: Includes repairing ophthalmic goods, eyeglasses, sunglasses, lenses ground to prescription, contact lenses, safety goggles

name: Military Remote-Control Systems Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the unmanned aerial military equipment which are controlled by the remote control of operator on the ground, such as, aircrafts, ships and boats, submarines and other equipment fitted with remote sensing systems, it involves the mechanical parts and electronic slides.
authority: Environmental Administration - Dubai Municipality / Dubai Civil Aviation Authority is required

name: Optical Media Discs Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing audio - visual compact discs for data storage, duplication, omission or to serve as identification cards, the wrapping plastic cases and bags making is also included .

name: Airplanes Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing different airplanes for various purposes, including the wide-body commercial aircrafts designed for carrying passengers and cargo, helicopters for transportation of people, search and rescue, tourism, medical transport, and the unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV) and Drones controlled by the remote control of a pilot on the ground, in order to use for survey, still and video imaging, mapping and inspection.
authority: Environmental Administration - Dubai Municipality / Dubai Civil Aviation Authority is required

name: Aircrafts Parts and Accessories Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of parts and accessories of the aircrafts, as well as the interior and mechanical structure, such as fuselages, wings, doors, flight control surfaces, landing gear, fuel tanks, nacelles, motors and engines, cabin, seats, inflight entertainment system.
authority: Environmental Administration - Dubai Municipality / Dubai Civil Aviation Authority is required

name: Satellites Manufacturing
description: Includes firm specialized in manufacturing  satellites  thrown by  rockets into the orbit and which are designed for a variety of purposes, including communications, earth observation, meteorology, navigation, planetary exploration.
authority: The approval of the Mohammed bin Rashid Space Center is required

name: Remote-control Airplane Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV) and Drones controlled by the remote control of a pilot on the ground, in order to use for survey, still and video imaging, mapping and inspection.
authority: Environmental Administration - Dubai Municipality / Dubai Civil Aviation Authority is required

name: Military Aircrafts Manufacturing
description: Includes firms specialized in manufacturing military fixed-wing aircrafts and helicopters.

name: Aircraft Cabin Simulators Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the flight simulation training devices that model and simulate the characteristics of the real processes used to train pilots on the ground instead to training in an actual aircraft.
authority: Environmental Administration - Dubai Municipality / Dubai Civil Aviation Authority is required

name: Aircraft Engine and Parts Repair and Overhaul
description: Includes repairing, maintaining, testing and calibrating all kinds of aircrafts engines and spare parts.

name: Light Aircrafts Maintenance and Repair
description: Includes firms engaged in maintaining and repairing helicopters commercial and military small and light aircrafts, which are capable to sustain a maximum total weight (MTOW) of LB 12500 at overtaking, overhauling is also involved.

name: Passengers and Cargo Aircrafts Repair and Maintenance
description: Includes firms engaged in maintaining, repairing, and modernizing passengers and cargo aircrafts to ensure their airworthiness, it involves aircrafts interior and system’s modifications, as well as internal and external aircrafts paint works.

name: Helicopters Repair and Maintenance
description: Includes firms engaged in maintaining and repairing helicopters to ensure their airworthiness, involving performing the overhaul, engine repairs and upgrades, customizations and restorations, avionics upgrades.

name: Chandeliers Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing different chandeliers whether luxurious types coated with precious metals ad decorated with crystal, or normal types coated with other metals and decorated with glass.

name: Lighting Fitting and Fixtures Assembling
description: Includes assembling lighting devices used in public gardens, parks, squares, airports, sports stadium and others.

name: Farming of cows
description: Includes firms engaged raising cattle for rebreeding or for using as livestock for meat (beef and veal), or as dairy animals for milk and other dairy products.
authority: Ministry of Climate Change and Environment, Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Farming of Horses
description: Includes raising Arabian horses and thoroughbreds and providing health care and right nutrition as well as reproducing specifically desired horses through planned matings, it involves training horses for riding and racing.
authority: Ministry of Climate Change and Environment, Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Farming of Sheep and Goats
description: Includes raising sheep and goats principally for their meat, lamb or mutton, for their milk, or for wool or for rebreeding.
authority: Ministry of Climate Change and Environment, Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Farming of Poultry
description: Includes poultry farms specialized in raising boilers for meat only, or raising laying hens for egg, or being a mixed farm for both.
authority: Ministry of Climate Change and Environment, Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Egg Production
description: Includes commercially producing egg in poultry farms, it also involves packaging and marketing.
authority: Ministry of Climate Change and Environment, Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Falcon Breeding
description: Includes breeding and producing different species of falcons for commercial purposes. It involves conducting research pertaining to falcon reproduction, domestication and cross-breeding.
authority: Ministry of Climate Change and Environment, Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Farming of Ostrich
description: Includes setting up man-made beehives amid agricultural areas rich of flowers the source of nectar from which bees make honey, the beehives house honey, beeswax, propolis, pollen, royal jelly, bee venom.
authority: Ministry of Climate Change and Environment

name: Farming of Deer
description: Includes raising deers and providing health care and right nutrition as well as reproducing specifically desired spices through planned matings, it involves conducting research to improve the efficiency of breeding and domestication.
authority: Ministry of Climate Change and Environment, Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Beehives and Honey Production
description: Includes setting up man-made beehives amid agricultural areas rich of flowers the source of nectar from which bees make honey, the beehives house honey, beeswax, propolis, pollen, royal jelly, bee venom.
authority: Ministry of Climate Change and Environment

name: Birds Raising
description: Includes breeding different species of birds such parrot, peacock, canary, pigeon and others for commercial purposes. It involves conducting research regarding breeding and domestication.
authority: Ministry of Climate Change and Environment, Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Live Stock Trading
description: Includes reselling livestock such as camels, cows, horses, goats and sheeps.
authority: Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Horses Trading
description: Includes reselling Arabian and thoroughbred horses for racing, training and breeding.
authority: Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Bovine Semen Trading
description: Includes firms specialized in trading local or imported high quality semen derived from bulls with better genetic potentials to use in artificial insemination to assure the diversity of herd as well as improving the quality and quantity of the milk produced.

name: Batteries Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing and assembling motor vehicle batteries component for generating low voltage electric power, it includes also charging, transferring and reusing of electrical power.

name: Dry Cell Batteries Manufacturing
description: includes manufacturing the device consisting of one or more electrochemical cells that convert stored chemical energy into electrical energy, it involves the primary type used once and discharges, and the secondary type designed for recharging and used multiple times.

name: Energy storage units Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing batteries to store solar and wind generated energy in chemical form, for use after sunset or when wind isn’t blowing.

name: Optical Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing ophthalmic goods, eyeglasses, sunglasses, lenses ground to prescription, contact lenses, safety goggles

name: Contact Lenses Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the plastic lens placed on the surface of the eye either to correct visual defects or for cosmetic or therapeutic reasons.

activityGroup: Manufacture of gold and precious stones cutting
name: Gold and Precious Metal Casting
description: Includes smelting, purifying shaping gold and precious in ingots with standardized weights and sizes. It also includes gold and precious metals rolling and extrusion to make respective wires, papers and chips.

activityGroup: Manufacture of gold and precious stones cutting
name: Gold and Precious Metal Products Manufacturing
description: Includes gold smithing of gold and other precious metals (excluding silver), such as platinum, nickel and other precious metals to produce jewellery and gold articles, such as rings, bracelets, earring and other showpieces.

activityGroup: Manufacture of gold and precious stones cutting
name: Silverware and Jewellery Manufacturing
description: Includes turning the silver formed sheet metal into household hollowware such as dishes, cups, teapots, or making tableware cutlery.

activityGroup: Manufacture of gold and precious stones cutting
name: Precious Stones Cutting and Polishing
description: Includes cutting, polishing, burnishing of precious stones into small pieces to prepare for jewellery making.

activityGroup: Manufacture of gold and precious stones cutting
name: Precious Jewellery Manufacturing
description: Includes the fitting of jewels or diamonds and precious stones on Jewellery products, watches or accessories as well as other gold articles and precious metals.

name: Mattresses Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing mattresses that contains materials such as hair, straw, cotton, foam rubber, or a framework of metal springs.

name: Spring Mattresses Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing mattresses fitted with spring using wire coils.

name: Medicine Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing any type of formulation that contains one or more medical substances and which is used to cure or prevent human diseases, or used for any other medical purpose such as disinfecting the environment.
authority: Environmental Department - Dubai Municipality, Ministry of Health and Community Protection

name: Vaccines and Inoculants Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the biological preparation that improves immunity to a particular disease from weakened or killed forms of the microbe causing the disease, also the substances introduced into the body to produce or increase immunity to a particular disease.
authority: Environmental Department - Dubai Municipality, Ministry of Health and Community Protection

name: Medicinal Chemicals Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing chemicals that pharmacological properties to use in the manufacture of medicaments whether for diagnostic, preventive, therapeutic and disinfective uses such as alcohols ethanol (ethyl alcohol).
authority: Environmental Department - Dubai Municipality, Ministry of Health and Community Protection

name: Veterinary Medicine Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing pharmaceuticals, medicinal chemical and botanical products for diagnosing and treating animals diseases.

name: Medical and Surgical Requisites Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of articles and devices, other than medicines and pharmaceuticals, used in surgery, such as, wound dressing and surgical sutures, therapeutic biomaterials, membranes, dental materials, human and animal sourced grafts, also, masks, gloves, bandages, plasters …etc

name: Preparation of Botanical Products for Pharmaceutical Use
description: Includes firms engaged in preparing extracts of natural botanical products by grinding, grading, milling to make such plant-derived compounds as the basis for pharmaceutical drugs

name: Pharmaceuticals Packing
description: Includes repacking pharmaceuticals such as wounds antiseptics, paraffin oils, laxatives, creams, carbonates and permanganates powders, in addition to other pharmaceuticals packed in small glasses, plastic, metal or paper packs for personal consumption .

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Leaf Spring Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing leaf springs to use in motor vehicle suspensions.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Handling, Loading and Lifting Equipment Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing hand-operated or power-driven tools and equipment utilized in lifting, handling, loading or unloading in ports, airports and customs stations, including winches, handling equipment, carriages.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Construction Equipment and Spare Parts Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing building and construction equipment for excavating, filling, demolition, earth leveling, road paving, cement mixing equipment and machinery, as well as cranes, elevators and heavy objects lifts, it involves the spare parts and accessories

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Construction Equipment and Machinery Assembling
description: Includes assembling building and construction equipment for excavating, filling, demolition, earth leveling, road paving, cement mixing equipment and machinery, as well as cranes, elevators and heavy objects lifts .

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Motor Vehicles Assembly
description: Includes manufacturing of assembled motor vehicles for transporting passengers, for personal use or otherwise , also, trucks for different commercial uses, the process involves the assembling using parts and components fully manufactured outside the factory or partly inside.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Motor Vehicles Manufacturing
description: Includes firms where skilled workers and robotic systems bring together all of the necessary loose components, such as chassis, body, engine, tires, whether fully manufactured outside the factory or partly inside, and then assemble together to create a final product

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Trailers Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the unpowered trailers which are pulled by a powered vehicle and which are used for transport of goods and materials or as mobile homes.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Refrigerated Trailers Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the refrigerator truck designed to carry perishable freight at specific temperatures which can be equipped with any one of a variety of mechanical refrigeration systems powered diesel engines.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Tanker Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing mobile reservoirs, tanks and similar containers of metal to transport water and petroleum products and which are designed to deal with a heavy sloshing load and the risk of collision or other accident.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Mobile Concrete Mixers Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the refrigerator truck designed to carry perishable freight at specific temperatures which can be equipped with any one of a variety of mechanical refrigeration systems powered diesel engines.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Vehicles Bodies Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing vehicle bodies by means of cutting, fixing or welding using steel, metal or fiberglass or other material, also, making boxes for ambulances, security and ice cream vehicles.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Trucks Tarp Covering Systems Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing manual and automatic covering systems for loads in heavy and light trucks and trailers, the system incorporates manual and automatic mechanism to operate, so load dumping on roads is avoided as well as damaging other vehicles on the road by flying rubbish.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Automobile Outfitting
description: Includes workshop specialized in tuning and modifying the exterior or the interior of the passenger automobiles in order to personalize the characteristics of a vehicle to the owner's preference, as well as to provide better fuel economy, produce more power, better handling, the exterior includes changing characteristics of the vehicle via side skirts, front and rear bumpers, spoilers, interior involves the audio systems, air conditioning and soundproofing, modifying and customizing commercial vehicles to convert into trucks for other purposes such as food carts, ambulances, concrete-mixers…etc.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Outfitting Vehicles for Safe Transport
description: Includes modifying the exterior or the interior of the vehicles, in order to protect the transported individuals and materials, including money and explosives and military ordnance.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Radiator Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing radiators used for cooling internal combustion engines automobiles radiators through heat exchanging process, the cooling involves passing water through the engine block, where it absorbs heat from the engine, then the hot water is then fed into the radiator which releases the heat to the ambient air.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Exhausts Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing exhausts used to convey burnt gases from the engine.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Brake Pads Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing pads used to resist friction in cars and trucks brake systems.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Auto Accessories Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of accessories and attachments fitted to motor vehicles in order to modify the external outline of the car, such as bumpers, air deflectors, additional tyre covers, baggage support base and other accessories made of metals, fiber glass or reinforced plastic...etc.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Vehicle Speed Limiter Assembling
description: Includes assembling the parts and components to produce the devices whose function is to control the fuel feed to the engine, in order to limit the vehicle speed to a preset value.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Motor vehicles spare parts Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing diverse parts and accessories such as brakes, gearboxes, radiators, silencers, exhaust pipes, steering wheels, used fully or partially in repairing and maintaining motor vehicles.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Military Vehicles Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing armored and unarmored vehicles used by the armed forces and police for land combat and transportation, including, fighting vehicles, personnel carriers, weapons carriers and missiles launchers, anti- tank vehicles, amphibious vehicles…etc.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Motorcycles and Scooters Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the of powered two or three-wheelers motorcycles, low-powered mopeds, off-road motorcycles for cruising in paved roads or for off road use, scooters which are equipped with battery to produce power.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Off Road Karts Assembling
description: See details of activitv no.(504003)

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Bicycles Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the two or three wheeled bicycles used for recreation, transportation, racing and for children use.

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Desert Driving Institute
description: Includes providing theoretical education and practical driving instruction to the drivers who hold valid driving licenses, to qualify them on the skills of off-road and sand dunes driving, for the sake of acquiring permits to conduct desert driving for tourist companies or to obtain experience to drive their own four wheel vehicles.

name: Tar Manufacturing
description: Includes producing tar from coal, wood, petroleum or beat through destructive distillation to use in road paving and water and humidity proofing in buildings.

name: Fuel Production
description: Includes producing refined petroleum by extracting from crude oil in refineries, including gasoline, diesel, naphtha, kerosene, fuel oil, it involves also producing biofuel vegetable oils or animal fats or agricultural products.

name: Petroleum Gas Liquefaction
description: Includes the liquefaction of petroleum gases, the Propane and Butane, as well as the mixing process to produce new gases.

name: Petroleum Gas Bottling
description: Includes the process of bottling petroleum gas which is prepared by refining petroleum or extracted from petroleum or natural gas streams as they emerge from the ground, it involves supplying in pressurized steel vessels in order to use for cooking and as fuel in heating appliances and vehicles.

name: Asphalt and Paving Materials Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing asphalt and paving materials derived from petroleum distillation for using in road paving.

name: Grease and Lubricants Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of various engines and machines grease and lubricants. Included also the firms manufacture compound oils.

name: Natural Gas Liquefaction
description: Includes converting the natural gas to liquid form for ease of storage or transport, the process involves transporting the extracted gas to the liquefaction facility where certain components such as water, condensates and carbon dioxide are removed, then the gas is then cooled down in stages until it is liquefied. LNG is finally stored in storage tanks and can be loaded and shipped.

name: Lubricants and Grease Refilling
description: Includes firms engaged in breaking bulk Lubricants and Grease in smaller lots consumer or commercial packs.

name: Grease and Lubricants Blending
description: Includes blending compatible base oils and additives to produce new brands of automotive lubricants, marine oils, gear oils, transmission oils and hydraulic oils.

name: Petrochemical Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the two classes of petrochemicals mainly olefins including ethylene and propylene, and the aromatics including benzene and toluene by deriving from petroleum, it involves producing olefins and aromatics in oil refineries by fluid catalytic cracking of petroleum fractions, also producing olefins in chemical plants by steam cracking of natural gas liquids, and aromatics by catalytic reforming of naphtha.

name: Manufacture of Liquefied Gases
description: Includes the conversion of gases like oxygen, carbon dioxide, hydrogen and nitrogen into liquid state for using in industrial and medical fields.

name: Landfill Waste Gas Recovery
description: Includes recovering and extracting landfill waste gases, particularly the methane, the process requires the engineering and design of the landfill including drilling, piping and storage for utilization or flaring the gases to minimize the risk of the landfills catch fire.

name: Production and Distribution of Gas
description: Includes natural gas production plants and distribution through networks for domestic, industrial and commercial consumption, it includes packaging of liquefied and gaseous helium, nitrogen and argon, distribution of gas cylinders by vehicles for domestic consumption is classified under Class 5141 - "Wholesale of solid, liquid and gaseous fuels.

activityGroup: Manufacture of tyres and rubber products
name: Tyre Retreading
description: Includes retreading vehicle tyres and render reusable.

activityGroup: Manufacture of tyres and rubber products
name: Rubber Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing natural or artificial rubber products, such as mats, rubber rings and glass fixation requisites.

activityGroup: Manufacture of tyres and rubber products
name: Synthetic Sponge Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing synthetic sponge from its primary chemical substances, and set in pieces, cubes or panels useable producing mattresses, furniture, or in wrapping and packaging etc.

activityGroup: Manufacture of tyres and rubber products
name: Flooring Materials and Mats Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing hardened rubber for flooring workshops, factories, hospitals and other buildings, also, for covering swimming pool edges, vehicles and boats bottons, gardens and sport tracks, in addition of rubber mats for houses and entrances.

activityGroup: Manufacture of tyres and rubber products
name: Sponge Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of natural and synthetic sponge products, used in bathrooms, utensils washing, in packaging, and in manufacturing garments or other products.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of bags, shoes and leather products
name: Suitcases Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of suitcases from genuine leather and its substitutes, and other suitcases partly manufactured from leather, and suitcases manufactured totally from substitute materials such as plastic, aluminum, or woven fabrics.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of bags, shoes and leather products
name: Hand Bags, Wallets and Belts Manufacturing
description: Includes Manufacturing leather and plastic and textiles hand bags and wallets and belts.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of bags, shoes and leather products
name: Shoes Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing men and women footwear for different purposes and of any material, involving whole or parts of the footwear whether by the traditional manual process or mechanical.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of bags, shoes and leather products
name: Slippers and Sandals Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing men and women open-sided slippers and sandals made for different uses and by any material, involving the traditional manual or mechanical processes.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of bags, shoes and leather products
name: Hides Tanning
description: Includes tanning, burnishing, Iutestring animal hides and make ready for further processing.

name: Salt Cubes Manufacturing
description: Includes obtaining salt cubes by washing high quality solar salt with controlled brine for using in Water treatment, textile dyeing, salt agent for soap, weed killers, cattle feeds.

name: Chlorinated Paraffin Oil Manufacturing
description: includes manufacturing the mixture of polychlorinated alkanes to use for a wide range of industrial applications, such as flame retardants and plasticizers, additives in metal working fluids, in sealants, paints and coatings.

name: Ammonia and Caustic Soda Manufacturing
description: Includes producing ammonia from combining hydrogen, which is produced from hydrocarbons, with nitrogen gas, which is found into the air, in order to use in manufacturing fertilizers and fodder, refrigeration and mining, also producing sodium hydroxide or caustic soda by the electrolysis of salt brine, in order to use in the manufacture of pulp and paper, soaps, textiles, drinking water and detergents.

name: Sulfur Manufacturing
description: includes producing sulfur from petroleum and natural gas processes to use in manufacturing of paints, paper, textiles, oil refining, wastewater processing, and mineral extraction, fertilizers.

name: Dry Ice Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing dry ice by pressurizing and liquefying carbon dioxide in steel cylinders, and when vaporizing the liquid to turn into a snow-like material which is characterized having several times the cooling capacity of the normal ice, it's used in food and beverage preservation, transport refrigeration, meat processing, equipment blast cleaning, cattle branding, fumigation, fog creation.

name: Composed Industrial Chemicals Manufacturing
description: Includes producing chemicals compounds, salts and other materials, and transform to powder, crystals, solutions or others, to be used directly in tests, analysis and chemical experiments, or in the purifying and sterilizing water, in the manufacture of gases or fertilizers, other industrial products except synthetic resins.
authority: Environmental Department - Dubai Municipality, Chemical Sects Department approval - Dubai Police is required

name: Acid Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of different kinds of acid, such as sulfuric acid, nitric acid, phosphoric acid and other organic and non-organic acids.

name: Water Treatment and Purification Chemicals Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the chemicals which purify water by assisting in the removal of the organic and inorganic particles suspended in water, it involves coagulants such as aluminum sulfate and iron chloride, it also involves combining chemical compounds to produce one or several chemical products to use in the purification.
authority: Environmental Department - Dubai Municipality, Chemical Sects Department approval - Dubai Police is required

name: Chemicals Blending
description: Includes producing one or several chemical products by combining chemical compounds and by using several different chemical reactions.
authority: Environmental Department - Dubai Municipality, Chemical Sects Department approval - Dubai Police is required

name: Green hydrogen Production
description: Includes producing carbon free green hydrogen by the electrolysis of water using the electricity that comes from renewable sources such as solar or wind, the generated hydrogen can be added to natural gas and burn it in thermal power plants or central heating plants, or as a feedstock for other energy carriers, or to power fuel cells in cars and ships.

name: Organic Fertilizer Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing Organic Fertilizers in Liquid Form, Granulated Form, Powder Form, from naturally occurring organic materials such as chicken litter, manure, compost, or naturally occurring mineral deposits.

name: Chemical Fertilizers Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing azoic, phosphate and potassium fertilizers, firms mainly engaged in urea production are listed under class 2411 (Manufacture of Basic Chemicals).

name: Crude Plastic Manufacturing
description: ncludes manufacturing of crude plastic such as high or low density Polyethylene, and other similar products obtained by extraction from the sources materials and be in compounds, granules or powder , which are formulated by molding or emitting.

name: Crude Fiber Glass Manufacturing
description: Includes producing fiber glass from source materials and forming in panels, grids, or textures and complementary chemicals useable in manufacturing fiber glass products for constructions or others.

name: Agricultural Pesticides Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing pesticides for preventing, controlling and exterminating agricultural pests, including disease carriers infecting plants or animals, by pests we mean all minute animals, plants, or living creatures that can be harmful or destructive, such as insects, spiders, nematode, bacteria, fungal, moss, plant viruses, harmful weeds, parasitic plants, harmful birds, rodents and others.

name: Paint Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing dyes and paints for buildings, constructions and decor, as well as for autos and metals, also, anti-corrosion and anti-erosion powdered paints for coating metals by anodizing. Other materials used in treating and processing dyes and paints such as thinners, thickeners, basic dyes and others.

name: Anti Corrosion Materials Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing metals and wood anti-corrosion and anti-erosion, as well as constructions and equipment anti-thermal elements.
authority: Environmental Department - Dubai Municipality, Chemical Sects Department approval - Dubai Police is required

name: Ink and Printing Materials Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing printing inks either being in powder, paste or as liquid, in addition to inject cartridges used in fax machines, photo copiers and computer printers.

name: Ink Mixing and Refilling
description: Includes proportionally mix and blend inks to produce a colour required by the customer

name: Varnish Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing chemical products for polishing metals, wood and leather, including floors and wooden doors varnish, as well as polishers of furniture, utensils and shoes.

name: Soap and Hair Care Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing hair care products like shampoo, oils, lotions, tonics, whether chemically originated or being natural extracts (herbs). Also included is manufacturing toilet and hand washing soap in bars and liquid, in addition toilet foamy soap and similar products.

name: Powder Detergents Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing washing powder of mixtures of chemical compounds used for cleaning laundry.

name: Bleaching Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing chlorine-based bleaches to use as household chemicals to whiten clothes and remove stains.

name: Detergents and Disinfectants Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing detergents, such as, soaps, shampoos, made of chemicals or other materials and used to clean floors, carpets and glass, remove stains from clothes and wash household utensils, also manufacturing disinfectants and sterilizers used to eliminate microorganisms from hands, surfaces, floors, and clothes.

name: Industrial Solvents Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing chemical products for cleaning machines, instruments and equipment, including air conditioners, boilers, lifts, motor vehicles engines and other machines and instruments.

name: Perfumes Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing different types of concentrated or light perfumes (toilet water) whether from synthetic or natural fragrant compounds (except eastern perfumes). Also included are after shaves, shaving creams, body lotions, deodorants, clothes and floor cover fragrances. The perfumes concerned could be in liquid, solid or powder forms.

name: Agar wood and Incense Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing agarwood, oriental perfumes and incense.

name: Cosmetics Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing cosmetics, such as body creams and lotions as well as various types of eye make-ups and facial cosmetics.

name: Tooth and Mouth Care Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the preparations for oral hygiene, including denture adhesive cream, cushions, pastes, cleansing tablets, brushes, dental plate powder, teeth whiteners, also, oral solutions, mouth moisturizes, mouthwash, mouth and throat rinse.

name: Cosmetics and Personal Care Preservatives Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing chemicals widely used by cosmetic and pharmaceutical industries, such as parabens, sodium benzoate, optiphen, suttocide, to protection of the products from contamination by bacteria, yeast, mold, and fungus, from the time the product is manufactured up until the time the product is completely used up by the consumer.

name: Fire Extinguishing Materials Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the materials that can extinguish fire by taking away any of the three components of the fire triangle which are fuel, heat and oxygen, the fire extinguishers involve gaseous materials such as Carbon dioxide and halon, liquid materials such as foam, and solid materials such as wet chemicals.

name: Synthetic Resins Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing synthetic resins to use in producing chemical products such as paints, dyes, perfumes, detergents, adhesives, ink, and other resins based chemical products.

name: Gum and Glue Manufacturing
description: Includes extracting gum and glue from raw materials, for direct use in such original state, or use in producing various chemical compounds, as substances for adhesive and cosmetics.

name: Adhesives Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing adhesive materials for sticking paper, glass, metal, plastic or wood pieces, to use in printing, lamination, packaging, in construction for fixing ceramic, slabs and moquette, or wall-paper...etc, also producing adhesive tapes in paper, plastic, fabrics or others.

name: Construction Chemicals Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing chemical agents and products to use in building for concrete improving and curing before and after pouring, water and humidity proofing, pounding and adhesion, joints sealing, solvents, floors handling, pasting and painting.
authority: Environmental Department - Dubai Municipality, Chemical Sects Department approval - Dubai Police is required

name: Oilfields Chemicals Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing chemicals for various oilfield applications like production, well stimulation, drilling and injection.
authority: Environmental Department - Dubai Municipality, Chemical Sects Department approval - Dubai Police is required

name: Coolants Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing coolants which are characterized of having high thermal capacity, low viscosity, chemically inert, and causing no corrosion when mixed with water and flown through or around a device to prevent its overheating.

name: Batteries Distilled Water Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing solutions used to activate the reaction or to maintain the balance of acid intensity in batteries used in generating electric power in vehicles, engines or storing energy or for other purposes.

name: Wax Candles Manufacturing
description: Includes producing candles in different sizes and colours from natural and artificial wax for lighting or decoration.

name: Test and Analysis Chemicals Manufacturing
description: Includes producing solutions, serums and chemicals intended for medical, agricultural, petroleum and engineering testing and analyzing, whether inside specialized lab or on site.
authority: Environmental Department - Dubai Municipality, Chemical Sects Department approval - Dubai Police is required

name: Fireworks Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing pyrotechnic products which capable of undergoing self-contained and self-sustained chemical reactions for the production of heat, light, gas, smoke or sound, and they are used in fireworks display.

name: Purification Materials Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing solid, liquid or powdered materials for purifying water and other fluids by removing contaminants, such as the power added to the narghile water to absorb nicotine and tar.

name: Propellant Powders Manufacturing
description: Includes firms specialized in the manufacture of chemicals used in the production of propellants, such as, nitrocellulose dissolved in nitroglycerin, black gunpowder and other propellants for bullets and missiles, propulsion systems for ammunitions and loaded bombs

name: Military Explosives and pyrotechnic products Manufacturing
description: Includes firms specialized in manufacturing primary and secondary explosives, as well as explosive boosters, timers and relays, also, mines, explosive breaching, smoke screens, sonic bombs, signaling flares, tears gases and other military fiery products.

name: Laboratory Diagnostics Reagents Manufacturing
description: Includes preparing lab reagents, solutions or solid like enzymes, clinical chemistry, strains or pregnancy test strips respectively, these materials are used to diagnose diseases through blood inside labs or urine in labs or homes, reagents are prepared according to approved protocols and subject to approval by authorized medical authorities.

name: Adhesive and Paper Slitting
description: Includes using slitting machines to cut large rolls of adhesives and papers into narrower rolls.

name: Organic Bacteria Production
description: Includes firms specialized in organic bacteria as a liquid contains different groups of microorganisms and use as an alternative to chemicals in agriculture and animal husbandry and raising of poultry and fishery, septic tanks and wastewater treatment plants, decomposition of sludge and the purification of the rivers, in waste materials and recovery facilities, in industrial solvents plants.

name: Sterilizers and Disinfectants Preparation
description: Includes preparing of disinfectants and sterilizers made of chemicals, either in a gaseous or liquid form and used to eliminate microorganisms from hands, surfaces, floors, and clothes, this activity involves the firms that use substances and tools as well as a volume of output that do not amount to manufacturing process.

name: Bed Sheets and Household Linen Manufacturing
description: Includes the process of cutting and tailoring sheets to manufacture bed covers, pillow cases, blankets, sheets and curtains. It also includes the manufacture of tablecloths and others.

name: Towels Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the absorbent textile towels are made from cotton, rayon and are used for drying or wiping.

name: Auto Upholstery Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of all kinds of auto-upholstery pieces such as seats or steering wheel and gear covers...etc. It also includes the manufacture of mats and similar products made of fabric, leather, plastic, or other natural or artificial fibers, which are prepared by means of cutting and tailoring.

name: Pillows and Cushions Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing pillows and cushions for bedrooms and sitting rooms.

name: Manufacture of Other Textiles
description: Includes manufacturing the textiles that have no separate activities.

name: Men's Underwear Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing men undergarments made of woven, knitted or crocheted fabric to be worn under other clothes, whether over the waist like T-shirts or below the waist like pants.

name: Men's Outerwear Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of men's cotton, wool, silk apparel, either knitted or woven. This includes all kinds of shirts, night wear (pyjamas), in-house clothes, beach and bath wear, trousers, shorts, ready made men's suits, ties and others

name: Children Wears Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of children's swaddling clothes, nappies, night wear, party clothes and dresses, shirts and trousers.

name: Children's underwear Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing children underwears made of woven, knitted or crocheted fabric.

name: Women Outerwear Manufacturing
description: Women Outerwear Manufacturing

name: Ladies' underwear manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing women undergarments made of woven, knitted or crocheted fabric to be worn under other clothes, whether over or below the waist.

name: Arabic Gown Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the wear over men gowns from knitted and crocheted fabrics.

name: Protective Garments and Vest Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of various garments such as vests, coats, gloves, trousers and other protective garments against external hazards including gun shots, radiation, heat, humidity and rain.

name: Sports Wears Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing men and women sportswear such as sweat shirts, sports jersey, boxer shorts, track pants and sports shorts…etc

name: Uniforms Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing unified formal clothing worn by members of an organization such as school clothing as well as work wear for staff and work men and women healthcare facilities and in the public and private sector.

name: Jackets and Overcoats Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing jackets and overcoats intended to be worn as fashion or as a winter dress.

name: Gloves Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing gloves out of different fabrics like cotton, wool or synthetic fibers as well as those made of natural leather and rubber.

name: Socks Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing men, ladies and sport socks from wool, cotton, nylon and polyester to use in protecting the foot and absorb sweat.

name: Caps and Headwear Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of different kinds of headwear for men and children such as "Ghoutras" (traditional Arab head wear), bonnets and caps, as well as ladies' head and face covers such as various types of veils. This activity also includes the manufacture of various kinds of hats made of textiles.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Paper and Paperboard Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of journal, writing, drawing, typing, and wrapping paper, made of wood, paper residues or fibers pulp.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Melamine Impregnated Paper sheets Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing cotton paper sheets to use in laminating wooden furniture , the process involves dappling and designing the sheets in different colors and then impregnate in melamine , to turn the laminated surfaces water-proof , chemical and scratch resistant.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Corrugated Carton Boxes and Containers Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of different sizes and types of boxes and containers made of corrugated or non-corrugated carton, used for wrapping and packaging different products in commercial packs in order to facilitate their transportation, shipping and storing.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Paper Boxes and Containers Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture and printing of boxes and packing bags made carton paper, water proofing plastic or wax coated paper, or paper lined with tin, aluminum or other materials which are used for packing of various industrial products.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Paper Bags Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the one layer or multiple layers bags for packaging and wrapping materials.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Core Paper Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing paper tubes and cores in various length and diameters, thickness up to12 ml, for wrapping raw materials such as carpet, moquette, nylon, paper, carton, textiles…etc

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Disposable Paper Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing disposable paper bowls, plates, dishes and straws to use indoor and outdoor.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Cards and Envelopes Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of blank greeting and invitation cards and envelopes of various sizes and types.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Diapers Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing diapers made of cloth or synthetic disposable materials.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Sanitary Napkins Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing ladies sanitary napkins made of cloth or synthetic disposable materials.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Paper Stationery Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of paper products for office use, such as computers and photocopiers paper, calculator rolls, cash machine and other similar paper products.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Self Adhesive Labels Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of self adhesive commercial and advertising labels and signs. This includes recutting, printing and preparation for various purposes.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Packaging Materials Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of all materials used in the wrapping and packing of industrial and household products, such as ordinary paper packs and packages or others made of wax, nylon chips or printed plastic chips. This includes metallic wrapping materials such as aluminum chips or compound materials manufactured from several of the above-said materials, also, bags and other material made out of resin, starch and natural substances that are designed to disintegrate and biodegrade in weeks.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Baby Care Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing plastic and rubber baby care products, such as, breastfeeding accessories, nursing accessories, cleaning and sterilizers, skin care accessories, pacifiers and teethers, health care and temperature readers.

name: Cigarettes Manufacturing
description: manufactured cigarettes from reconstituted tobacco which has additives to allow smoldering , the outer layer of paper and the cellulose acetate–based filter.

name: Treated Tobacco Manufacturing
description: Includes preparing tobacco leaves for manufacturing various tobacco products, including smoking tobacco, fruit-flavored pipe smoking tobacco and smokeless tobacco for snuffing and chewing.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Plywood Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of cross-wood boards, plywood boards, pressed granular wood boards, wood paste boards (MDF), or other types of wood boards.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Wood Drying and Processing
description: Includes processing wood taken from trees to make useable in construction or furniture and interior decoration making, it involves drying wood to reduce moisture by air or kiln, the degree of drying depends on the purpose of use.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Sawmilling and Planning of Wood
description: Includes workshops engaged in the sawmilling, cutting and latching of wood in order to produce boards, plywood and hardwood.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Wooden Doors and Windows Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing wooden doors and windows and accessories, whether traditionally styled or bullet and blast resistant styles, frames from the same materials are included.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Pre-Fabricated Buildings Manufacturing
description: Includes firms specialized in the manufacture of pre-fabricated buildings entirely or partly made of wood, or other materials, and are installed on site at different stages, or at once, involving also conversion and fitting of metal freight containers to be offices or food courts or first aid clinics This activity does not include firms specialized in manufacturing concrete buildings classified under activity no. 2695-07.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Wooden Decor Products Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of woodworks used in internal design (decor) such as oriels, partitions, stair and balcony rails, soles, vaults as well as other similar wooden products other than furniture and wood fixtures.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Wooden Cable Reels Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of wooden cables to use in packing cable and wire.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Wooden Boxes and Containers Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of boxes, cages, barrels and other wooden containers. It also includes containers made of palm branches, bamboo, fronds, cane and other similar materials.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Wooden Pallets Manufacturing
description: Includes fixing wooden parts and boards to make pallets for conveying equipment, cargo and containers in factories and storage compartments.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Bamboo, Cane and Wicker Products Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of various products made of cane, branches, bamboo and fronds, other than furniture or containers made of said.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Blinds Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing metal, plastic or wooden venting blinds which are fixed to be vertically or horizontally pleated.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Metal Partitions Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing readymade partitions used to divide space in offices and open halls, usually fully made of aluminum, sheet iron or other metals, this involves all metal partitions even if certain parts made of wood, plastic or carton.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Exhibition Stands Manufacturing
description: Includes firms engaged in manufacturing exhibitions fixtures including walls, ceilings, podiums and requisites.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Transport Furniture Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing seats and furniture fixed in airplanes, vehicles, yachts, ships and others.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Home Furniture Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing home furniture, such as beds, bedroom sets, sofas, lounge sets, tables, cupboards, chairs and others, also hotels or restaurants furniture, whether fully or partly manufactured from wood, metallic or plastic tubes, glass, bamboo, cane or others.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Kitchen Furniture Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the cabinets and fixtures of wood with metal fittings incorporated into them in order to install in kitchens for storage of cooking equipment and kitchen appliances.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Schools, Hospitals and Parks Furniture Manufacturing
description: Include manufacturing all kinds of furniture used in schools, laboratories, hospitals and parks, such as seats, tables, desks and beds, also other fittings, such as shelves, cupboards, display windows, platforms and others.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Auditoriums and Sports Venues Seats Manufacturing
description: Includes firms that manufacture seats from polypropylene and sponges in different sizes and colors, including folding chairs so that the back of the chair is fixed and the base is movable, giving the advantage of gaining space and most of these types are installed on iron stands according to standards to withstand sunlight, rain and shocks, and are not easily broken or removed from Place them and use these chairs in stadiums or movie theaters.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Office Furniture Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing office furniture of metal or wood and in various styles, colors and finishes, and intended for reception, desking, seating, screens, storage, conferences, boardrooms, waiting areas.

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Shop Fixtures Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing fixtures in groceries, consumer complexes, bookshops, small shops and exhibition halls, such fixtures are shelves, goods preserving cupboards, counters and iron cupboards...etc.

name: Slaughtering and Meat Preparing
description: Includes slaughtering cows, camels, sheep, goats , and prepare their meat for consumption .This includes cutting, wrapping and packaging.
authority: Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Meat Products Manufacturing
description: Includes processing food products that of meat origin, such as hot-dogs, conserved minced meat, slices of minced meat (hamburger) and others.

name: Meat Freezing
description: Includes freezing meat and packaging in packs or bags to render them consumable.

name: Poultry Slaughtering and Processing
description: Includes slaughtering chickens and pigeons and other species of poultry, and prepare their meat for consumption . This includes preparing, packaging or freezing.
authority: Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Poultry Products Manufacturing
description: Includes processing food products that of poultry meat origin, such as poultry minced meat, slices, hot dogs, and nuggets.This includes preparing, seasoning, packaging and canning for final consumption.

name: Meat Products Preparation
description: Includes firms engaged in preparing food products that of meat origin, such as hot-dogs, conserved minced meat, slices of minced meat (hamburger)..etc, this activity involves the firms that use substances and tools as well as a volume of output that do not amount to manufacturing process.

name: Poultry Products Preparation
description: Includes firms engaged in preparing food products that of poultry meat origin, such as poultry minced meat, slices, hot dogs, and nuggets, it includes, seasoning, packaging and canning for final consumption, this activity involves the firms that use substances and tools as well as a volume of output that do not amount to manufacturing process.

name: Heavy and Light Aircrafts and Helicopters Trading
description: Includes trading of all types of civil aircrafts , and helicopters used for transportation of people and cargo, search and rescue, tourism, medical transport and aerial observation, and other civil related usages

name: Military Equipment, vehicles and weapons Spare Parts Trading
description: Includes establishments specialized in trading spare parts for all types of military equipment, vehicles and weapons.

name: Military Ammunition, Explosives and Pyrotechnic products
description: Includes firms specialized in the wholesale and import of all types of firearms, ammunition and equipment that are designed specifically for military use like machine guns, individual weapons, such as revolvers, shotguns, ammunition and projectiles, also, military smoke screens, sonic bombs and signaling flares, it excludes hunting rifles.

name: Airline Inflight Products Trading
description: Includes reselling of various products specifically made for airlines to use including food trolleys, blankets, towels, cushions, plastic and metal cutlery, dishes and cups, toys and children items, paper products.

name: Wireless Telecommunications Equipment Trading
description: Includes reselling the equipment for the transmission of voice, data, text, sound and video using a wireless telecommunications infrastructure, including mobile and fixed units, massaging devices or inter- communicative mobile unites, also, ground stations receiving information or communication or any transmission oriented by satellites, such firms are allowed to carry out the installation, repair and maintenance services for the equipment they deal in.

name: Telecommunications Equipment Trading
description: Includes reselling of equipment and systems used in operating fixed and mobile telecommunication networks, including exchanges, central switch boards, and mini switch boards located in commercial complexes, intercom systems, optic fibre and copper made inter connecting networks, such firms are allowed to carry out the installation, repair and maintenance services for the equipment they deal in.

name: Visual Recorded Media Trading
description: Includes reselling visual materials recorded on cassettes and discs and other magnetic and optical recording media, including, video and television programs, songs, lectures, educational courses, religious materials, video games …etc.

name: Aircraft Spare Parts and Components Trading
description: Includes reselling specialized parts of railway locomotives and rolling Stock, such as axles and wheels, brakes, hooks and coupling devices, buffers, shock absorbers, wagon and locomotive frames, bodies, corridor connections.

name: Airport Equipment Trading
description: Includes reselling the support equipment found at airport terminal, such as baggage handling system, x-ray inspectors, metal detectors, luggage and body scanners, also, equipment at the ramp area, such as bag carts, trolleys for containers and pallets, ground power units, container loader, passenger boarding stairs., such firms are allowed to carry out the installation, repair and maintenance services for the equipment they deal in

name: Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (Drone) Trading
description: Includes reselling unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV) and Drones controlled by the remote control of a pilot on the ground, in order to use for survey, still and video imaging, mapping and inspection., such firms are allowed to carry out the installation, repair and maintenance services for the equipment they deal in

name: Light Aircraft Trading
description: Includes reselling light aircraft with a maximum gross takeoff weight of 100,000 lbs and are used commercially for passenger and freight transport, sightseeing, photography and personal use.

name: Gliders, Sailplanes and Spare Parts Trading
description: Includes reselling non-motorized glider or sailplane for using in gliding.

name: Fire Fighting and Safety Equipment Trading
description: Includes reselling of equipment and machinery used in vocational safely, labor accident preventives, natural hazards protective tools, also, firefighting equipment like electric cables, smoke exhaust fans, alarm bells, manual extinguishers, hoses, sprinklers, pumps, dampers, emergency/exit lights, nozzles, automatic fire detectors, wet fire systems, such firms are allowed to carry out the installation, repair and maintenance services for the equipment they deal in

name: Global Positioning Systems (G.P.S) Trading
description: Includes reselling the specialized systems that provide users, in land or sea, with accurate information about their positions, as well as serving as navigators and trackers in different transport means, such firms are allowed to carry out the installation, repair and maintenance services for the equipment they deal in

name: Security Systems and Equipment Trading
description: Includes selling security systems and equipment, such as, security gates, metal detectors, thermal binoculars, radar systems, police specialized equipment, surveillance and access control equipment, as well as the related accessories, such firms are allowed to carry out the installation, repair and maintenance services for the equipment they deal in

name: Military Vehicles and Equipment Spare Parts Trading
