description: Is an area attached to the business center, which includes many furnished office spaces and provided with technical support and office services to become a suitable environment for business practice, with a total area not less than 2000 square feet and aims to contribute to the sustainability of business in the Emirate of Dubai
authority: It can only be added to activity No. 6810007 “Business Center”

name: Kitchen Incubator
description: The kitchen incubators aim to serve the largest number of unlicensed food projects by providing an integrated work environment that includes: obtaining a cooking place, licensing, training, supervising by the experts, product’s marketing and delivery, where creativity of food products is encouraged through a number of variant kitchens that suits the needs of the license applicants and therefore qualify these products to be launched in the local market in-line with the needs of the market, , also, it provides common usage areas or licensed closed kitchen areas for the production of food, tenants or members can use the kitchen for an hour or a day to produce food with a commitment to regulations. Food entrepreneurs, ranging from chefs, food suppliers, food trucks owners, bakers and value-added producers, can take advantage of the kitchen incubator
authority: Prior approval is required from the Hamdan Center for Creativity and Innovation, affiliated with the Mohammed bin Rashid Establishment for Small and Medium Enterprises Development.

name: Business Incubator
description: It’s a venue designed to house start-up entrepreneurs and enterprises where they can enjoy an array of business support and guidance, this involves the provision of office spaces and technical and administrative services, innovative ideas and counseling, marketing and business potentials planning, bank finance choices, coordinate interaction with the business community outside the incubator to build relations, firm intend to practice this activity should be licensed as legal, financial or management consultant.
authority: Prior approval is required before initial approval from the Hamdan Center for Creativity and Innovation, affiliated with the Mohammed bin Rashid Establishment for Small and Medium Enterprises Development. The activity is granted to government agencies

name: Coworking Spaces Operation
description: Includes firms that operate the furnished and technically supported spaces to become a suitable place to provide some services such as workshops, lectures, training and consultations, as well as being prepared to become a suitable environment for employees and students to work and meet for temporary periods, it also includes office spaces that are rented to provide various services such as fine arts works and children’s skills development, printing services, and stores for food and beverage, sta

name: Leasing and Management of other people's property
description: Includes firms engaged in managing commercial, residential, industrial buildings through contracting with the owner in order to re-lease on subcontracting bases also, handling contractual arrangements with the firms in- charge of maintenance, security and as well as issuing tenants contracts, such firms are not allowed to practice Leasing Brokerage
authority: A guarantee of 5 million dirhams issued by a local bank in favor of the Department of Economy and Tourism is required before the license is issued

name: Real Estate Valuation Services
description: This includes the appraisal and assessing the value of fixed property such as plots of land and building for various reasons at the request of specialized surveyors or by official authorities.
authority: It is required to review the Real Estate Regulatory Agency after issuing the license

name: Real Estate Development
description: This refers to companies established for the development and founding of real estate projects which include housing and commercial complexes, tourism projects, and the development of the infrastructure and leisure facilities for such projects. It also covers the selling of the property or projects per the free hold ownership law of property whether owned by the license holders or another party through a contract signed between the developer and the land owner and registration of the contract in the Escrow Accounts Department ahead of the commencement of the project.
authority: Real Estate Regulatory Agency approval is required before a license is issued, Tittle deed should be under the license owner/ owners - certificate of good conduct from Dubai police - the project should be registered in the Escrow Accounts Department after the license is issued, If no project is registered within 6 month the license will get canceled - activity fee 25000 DH per year.

name: Leasing and Management of Self- Owned Property
description: Includes firms engaged in managing commercial, residential, industrial buildings owned by the owner and his first and second- degree relatives, also, handling contractual arrangements with the firms in-charge of maintenance, security and as well as issuing tenants contracts, such firms are not allowed to practice real estate Brokerage.
authority: Real Estate Regulatory Agency approval is required before a license is issued, The copy of title deed showing that the property is under the license owner's name – provision of building completion certificate – minimum of 8 million property evaluation certificate required as per law no. 2/20032

name: Real Estate Management Supervision Services
description: Includes firms specialized in managing and supervising properties as regarding contracting with the firms in charge of maintenance, cleaning and security services, handling the administrative issues for the property's owner, coordinate with lease brokers to find tenants for vacant units in the building, these firms are not allowed to practice selling, leasing or releasing properties
authority: Special/Director Approvals, certificate of good conduct from Dubai police, Managers, sales employees must be registered in RERA brokerage section and get access to Ejari system before starting the business - activity fee 5000 DH per year

name: Jointly Owned Property Management Services
description: Includes firms specialized in managing and supervising the jointly owned properties, joint facilities, common area parts and private jointly owned area parts in jointly owned properties including master community projects within the main tasks in financial management, facilities management, managing the affairs of owners’ committees and real estate units owners, and maintaining the quality of life and sustainability of the real estate project through the conclusion of contracts and agreements wi
authority: It is required to review the Real Estate Regulatory Agency after issuing the license, certificate of good conduct from Dubai police - Bachelor degree certificate for the manager - minimum of 3 years’ experience in the real estate industry for the foreigner

name: Leasing Property Brokerage Agents
description: Includes the firms which work as a connection link between landlords and tenants regarding property lease against remuneration, their role will end up when said parties reach an agreement.
authority: It is required to review the Real Estate Regulatory Agency after issuing the license, Companies are not allowed to be owners or partners - certificate of good conduct from Dubai police - real estate practitioner course for bachelor degree holder and diploma real estate course for non-graduate -, registration the owner and staff at the broker department and obtaining broker ID card - Owners are not allowed to have more than one real estate brokerage license - activity fee 25,000 DH per year.

name: Real Estate Services Trustee
description: Includes firms permitted by Land Department to provide real estate services via computerized system, it involves registering tenancy agreements in Ejari, undertake registration in the training courses, issuance of “to whom it may concern certificates”, the regulations pertaining to any of these services should be preserved.
authority: Real Estate Regulatory Agency approval is required before a license is issued, certificate of good conduct from Dubai police - The office and its employees shall be registered at the Real Estate Trustees Register who shall obtain a Real Estate Services Trustee Card - activity fee 5000 DH per year.

name: Kitchen Units Center
description: It is a cooking facility comprising many kitchen units that are furnished and equipped with all kitchen essentials and rented on an annual basis and under a lease contract for licensed entities involved in foods preparation that want the center to be the location of their business.
authority: It is required to review the Municipality Planning and Survey Department before issuing the initial approval / and the approval of the Food Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Beauty Coworking Spaces Operation
description: Includes firms that operate the furnished and technically supported spaces to become a suitable place where self-employed beauticians can rent temporary a workplace to provide services to clients, these beauticians are neither licensed nor are sponsored by the operator
authority: Prior approval from the Health and Safety Department of Dubai Municipality is required for the decorative plan., The activity is granted under an independent license and is not spent or added to any other activity.

name: Billiard and Pool Room
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of billiard and snooker, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves operating billiards rooms where people get together for playing billiards and snooker.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Sports and Amusement Tracks
description: Includes firms which offer and rent sport indoor and outdoor facilities and courts with a view for entertaining, including pitches and courts for football, basketball, volleyball, tennis, badminton, squash, swimming and diving pools, running tracks, rock climbing, cycling races, shooting, aiming arrows ….etc.

name: Educational Institutions’ Sport Facilities Leasing
description: Includes permitting educational institutions to lease their own sport facilities to others, including, courts for football, basketball, volleyball, badminton, also, tennis grounds, squash courts, swimming pools, athletics tracks.

name: Recreation Services for People of Determination
description: Includes offering recreational programs for people of determination, these programs are designed to promote inclusion, minimizes deconditioning, optimizes physical functioning, and enhances overall well-being, it includes sport activities, yoga classes, life skills, cultural and music arts, dance classes, cooking classes, summer camps, field trips

name: Electronic Games Arcade
description: Includes operating halls where people get together for playing electronic and video games.

name: Recreational Playground
description: Includes firms that equip arenas for entertainment activities such as inflatable games, electric cars, swings, sliding platforms, water games, horse shows, and others.

name: Kids Amusement Arcade
description: Includes halls equipped with facilities for entertaining children of different age categories, , such firms are allowed to sell the activity-related materials in non-commercial quantities

name: Regional Liaison Office
description: This is an office established in Dubai by any foreign company or enterprise to facilitate the contacts and follow-up of the company's activities and affairs, and to promote the company services. Such an office may not carry out the company's activities nor make any trading activity inside the UAE.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Scales and Dry Measures Repairing andMaintenance
description: Includes repairing and maintaining electric and sensitive scales, dry measures and balance equipment used for weighing.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Air-conditioning, Refrigeration and Air Purifying Equipment Repairing and Maintenance
description: Includes repairing and maintaining different air-conditioning systems, central, window or split units as well as coolers, cold storage compartments, central water cooling and other refrigeration equipment.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Office Machines and Calculators Maintenance and Repairing
description: Includes the repair and maintenance of of electronic calculators and typewriters and printing sets.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Photocopiers Repair and Maintenance
description: Includes repairing and maintaining photocopiers, microfilming machines, microfilm and projectors and copiers.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Amusement Center Equipment Repair and Maintenance
description: Includes repairing and maintaining amusement centers’ equipment such as billiard tables, electronics and manual games devices.. etc.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Auto Phones Installation and Repair
description: Includes fitting mobile phones into automobiles.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Computer Repair and Maintenance
description: includes the repair of desktop and laptop computers and peripheral equipment , involving magnetic disk drives, flash drives and other storage devices, printers, monitors, keyboards, internal and external computer modems, servers.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Telecommunications Equipment Repair
description: Includes firms repair telephone, telex, fax sets and telecommunications equipment and systems, land satellite stations, receivers, transmitters and wireless equipment.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Mobile Phone Repair
description: Includes firms engaged in cellular mobile phones maintenance and repair, including reconditioning, screen replacement, antenna, phone housing, water damaged phones and damaged parts change.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Electronic Instruments Devices and Equipment Repair
description: Includes repairing all electronics appliances and equipment not given in details in this class

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Antennas Installation and Repair
description: Includes installing and fixing antennas to use in radio and television broadcasting, telecommunication receivers, wireless computer network, radar.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Mobile Phone Upgrading Services
description: Includes upgrading operating systems in cellular mobile phones, as well as performing modification on the basic software. The modifications cover installing anti-virus programs, reinforcing transmission systems, handling programming related malfunctions, such as screen vanishing, decoding code number, data updating, phone programming to match the transmission system, phone adjustment.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Electric Household Appliances Repair and Maintenance
description: Includes firms engaged in repairing household refrigerators, washing machines, irons, vacuum cleaners, fans, mixers, toasters and other electric kitchen appliances, radio, TV, video sets.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Cookers and Cook Stove Repair
description: Includes repairing electric, gas, coal or kerosene burners, ovens and cookers.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Musical Instruments Repair and Maintenance
description: Includes repairing and Maintaining electronic and normal musical instruments like stringed, wind, and percussion instruments, pipes, accordions, organs.

name: Transformers and Switchgear Repair and Maintenance
description: Includes maintaining the devices that convert an alternating (A/C) current of a certain voltage to an alternating current of different voltage, also switchgears used to control, protect and isolate electrical equipment.

name: Railway Maintenance
description: Includes firms engaged in maintaining railway system and infrastructure, involving rolling stock, track, power generation and distribution, signaling, related communication systems, electro mechanical equipment…etc.

name: Light Equipment and Machinery Repairing and Maintenance
description: Includes repairing and maintaining light equipment and machinery used for various sector, medical, packaging, transport, construction, safety …etc.

name: Heavy Duty Equipment and Machinery Repairing and Maintenance
description: Includes firms repair machinery and equipment, lifts, escalators, boilers, central kitchens, automatic washing equipment, electric generators, water pumps, tower cranes…etc.

name: Marine Equipment Repairing and Maintenance
description: Includes installing and repairing the equipment related to structures for marine transportation, such as ships, boats, floating structures, pontoons, barges, cranes, the concerned equipment include propulsion systems, steering systems, engines, air-conditions, generators, ventilation blowers, boilers, spindles, pipes, communication and measuring devices.

name: Medical and Laboratory Equipment Repair
description: Includes repairing and maintaining instruments and equipment used in hospitals, clinics and laboratories for diagnosis, treatment, surgical operations, medicine and blood preservation, X-raying, sterilization, waste disposal, physical therapy and rehabilitation.

name: Shooting Arenas Equipment Repairing and Maintenance
description: Includes repairing and maintaining shooting ranges equipment such as air-conditioning and ventilation systems, sound abatements, static and moving targets, scoring systems, control towers..etc.

name: Gas Cylinders Testing and Repair
description: Includes shops and workshops specialized in testing filled various gas cylinders, pressed air, medical gases and water divers specialty gas cylinders, also, verifying the validity of such cylinders as well as carry out repairing and maintaining such cylinders.

name: Banking Representative Office
description: Includes offices established in the Emirate of Dubai and managed by any of the international foreign banks. They are intended to promote the activities of the major banks existing in the fatherland country or those of any of their branches. They are also assigned to facilitate contacts between the concerned banks and their clients.

name: Scientific Office
description: This is a scientific office established by a local pharmaceutical company to promote its products, as well as conducting advertising and facilitating contacts and deals with the local customers, such office is not allowed to engage in importing, trading, storing or distributing such products in UAE.

name: Representative Office
description: This is an office established in Dubai by any international company or enterprise to represent it in the UAE in order to promote its products and services, boost business, or facilitate commercial agreements between the principal the customers, such office is not allowed to carry out any trading activity nor enter into commercial transactions and deals by itself.

name: Companies Representation
description: Includes firms act as representative of foreign companies or enterprises in the UAE, as per contracts and authorizations, in order to promote their products and services, boost business, or facilitate commercial agreements between the principals the potential customers, contacting local businesses to encourage imports from the principals, such firms are not allowed to carry out any trading activities by themselves.

name: Government Tourist Liaison Office
description: This is an office established in Dubai by an entity subsidiary to a foreign government to work as a representative and tourism promoter. This office is neither allowed to involve in direct transactions, nor to conclude contracts or agreements by itself.

name: Ready-made Meals and Dishes Preparation
description: Includes producing convenience meals by pre- cooking and packaging and make ready to eat after heating, it involves producing the salads and spices premixes by the same way, it does not include the preparation of meals for immediate consumption as in restaurants.

name: Baker
description: Includes backing traditional bread using traditional bakeries.

name: Restaurant
description: Includes restaurants equipped with the suitable installations to prepare and serve food and snacks inside, as well as various beverages for immediate consumption by the public.
authority: Food Safety Administration (Dubai Municipality), Sanitation and Irrigation Department

name: Cafeteria
description: Includes cafeterias that sell snacks, juices and beverages to the public.
authority: Food Safety Administration (Dubai Municipality), Sanitation and Irrigation Department

name: Ice-Cream Shop
description: Includes shops which prepare and sell ice cream to the public for immediate consumption, factories which produce ice cream on commercial scale and in standard size packs are classified under (1520).

name: Restaurant and Mini Store
description: Includes restaurants equipped with the suitable installations to prepare and serve food and snacks inside, such firms are allowed also to sell some consumer goods such as fresh, preserved and canned foodstuff, beverages, dairy and bakery products as well as newspapers and magazines, the sale of such goods should not predominate the role of the restaurant.

name: Banquet kitchen
description: Includes the provision of food services based on contractual arrangements with the customers, such firms are allowed the take away service as the premises lacks the suitable installations for serving food .
authority: Food Safety Administration (Dubai Municipality), Sanitation and Irrigation Department

name: Pastry Preparing
description: Includes shops engaged in preparing and selling pastries directly to the public for immediate consumption, or selling un-cooked pastries to consumers in such a way that they can latter cook themselves.
authority: Food Safety Administration (Dubai Municipality), Sanitation and Irrigation Department

name: Fish and Meat Grilling
description: Includes shops engaged in cooking and grilling fish and meat to the public for taking away, such meals are not allowed to be served and eaten on the premises.
authority: Food Safety Administration (Dubai Municipality), Sanitation and Irrigation Department

name: Local Sweets Preparing
description: Includes preparing local sweets in stalls sell directly to the public for immediate consumption
authority: Food Safety Administration (Dubai Municipality), Sanitation and Irrigation Department

name: Sandwich Shop
description: Includes shops that provide sandwiches, juices and beverages for immediate consumption

name: Coffee Shop
description: Includes shops sell coffee, tea, Juices, biscuits and certain sweet cakes and ice-creams to the public.
authority: Food Safety Administration (Dubai Municipality), Sanitation and Irrigation Department

name: Juice and Soft Drinks Preparing
description: Includes shops that provide fruits juices for immediate consumption.

name: Sweets and Candies Preparing
description: Includes shops engaged in preparing and selling oriental and European sweets, tea, soft drinks, cakes and candies directly to the public for immediate consumption.
authority: Food Safety Administration (Dubai Municipality), Sanitation and Irrigation Department

name: Shisha Services
description: Includes serving shish in cafes or in other places as per the approval of the competent authorities.
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Oxygen Cafe
description: Includes firms operating oxygen stations where customers can inhale through a nasal cannula pure or flavored oxygen produced from the ambient air by an oxygen concentrator, which concentrate oxygen up to 98% compared to the normal atmospheric content of 21% oxygen, such concentrated oxygen is supposed to enhance health and well-being and reducing stress and increasing the body relaxation.

name: Roastery
description: Includes small shops engaged in roasting nuts, coffee beans, spices, cereals or others, and make the packing in small consumer packs, as well as carry out roasting for others, also, reselling gifts, novelties, artificial flowers and some foodstuff items, such shops are small that they are not classified as industrial firms of category (D).

name: Emergency Response Center
description: It’s a center founded by the firms involved in the manufacturing industries of petroleum and petrochemicals, in order to ensure the safety of such facilities against the surrounding high risk and also to mitigate its impact on people or the environment, the dangerous occurrence can range from natural disasters or fire, it includes the provision of firefighting logistic support, including fire engines and the trained crew.

name: Sewage and Draining Services
description: Includes firms which undertake sucking up and draining the sewage, rain, waste excessive waters by the tank vehicles, and transporting these waters to places where they can be used, refined or disposed of.

name: Wastewater and Hazardous Liquids Treatment
description: Includes plants engaged in treating sewage water and oily water generated from the industrial processes, through chemical and biological filtering processes to remove solids and organics and produce treated water to use in irrigation and industry.
authority: Dubai Municipality  - Sewage and Drainage Department

name: Grease Traps Cleaning and Wastes Removal
description: Includes cleaning and emptying grease traps designed to intercept and cooking oils and greases produced in the facilities engaged in catering services, such as hotels, restaurants, commercial complexes, labor camps..etc, it involves removing the waste grease to the treatment facilities before they enter a wastewater disposal system, in order to avoid damaging the environment as well as the sustainability of the sewers network.
authority: Food Safety Administration (Dubai Municipality), Sanitation and Irrigation Department

name: Garbage Disposal Services
description: Includes collecting of garbage and non-hazardous waste from residential, commercial, industrial and public areas, and then transport and dispose them in specified disposal sites determined by concerned authorities, it includes all municipal waste except construction and demolition waste, organic and horticultural waste.

name: Construction and Demolition Waste Collection and Transportation Services
description: Includes collecting waste originating from construction and demolition activities and transport by special to disposal sites determined by concerned authorities.

name: Sea and Shore Cleaning Services
description: Includes firms which undertake collection and disposing of or treating of marine wastes and pollutants which pollute beaches, sea natural , artificial lakes and marine lives.

name: Hazardous Waste Collection and Transport
description: Includes collecting solid and liquid or gaseous waste generated from manufacturing, medical or agricultural activities and which require special treatment as it cannot be disposed in regular landfills or sewer networks, because of it’s properties that make it dangerous or potentially harmful to human health or the environment. It involves the transportation by special vehicles to disposal sites determined by concerned authorities

name: Pollution and Environment Protection Services
description: Includes firms specialized in providing pollution control services either through pre-pollution control measures or by means of removing wastes mechanically, chemically, or by carbon surface absorption or by any other pollution control techniques.

name: Public Health Pests Control Services
description: Includes firms which undertake controlling of all type of pests, such as mosquitoes, flies and rodents at residential facilities and public utilities.
authority: Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Street Cleaning Services
description: Provision of general cleaning services for all streets, footpath and markets by manual or mechanical means.

name: Sanitary Sewer Networks Maintenance
description: Includes cleaning and maintaining sewer networks which transport human or industrial wastewater to treatment stations to avoid blockages caused by grease buildup or other foreign objects, it involves line cleanouts by water and air pumping and chemicals and solvents.

name: Ships and Yachts Building
description: Includes building of ships and boats by assembling the main parts which include funnels, sterns, rudders, portsides, anchors, decks, propulsion systems, steering systems, it also involves the construction of floating structures which include docks, pontoons, landing stages, tanks, barges, cranes

name: Ship Parts Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing parts and sections used for building ships or as spare parts, which include funnels, sterns, rudders, portsides, anchors, decks, propulsion systems, steering systems.

name: Warships Building
description: Includes firms specialized in building armored military boat and warships, such as, destroyers, frigates, aircraft carrier minesweepers, auxiliary ships, submarines, other warships used in combat and security operations

name: Boats Building
description: Includes firms whose activities are mainly related to the manufacture of various fishing or water sports boat hulls, as well as small and medium size yachts, made of metals, fiber glass, or other materials excluding wood, also, the preparation of boats and the installation of mechanical and electrical equipment and all appliances to render them operational.

name: Wooden Ships and Boats Building
description: Includes firms whose activities are mainly related to the building of ships and wooden boats, including traditional, such as goods and passengers ships and boats, fishing ships, (traditional Arab Abra), sports boats, or modern and wooden ships, also, reparation, re-building and maintenance.

name: Sailboards and Surfboards Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing surfboardsusing polyurethane or polystyrene foam and covered with layers of fiberglass, cloth and polyester in order to make light and strong enough to support wave riders.

name: Ships and Boats Repair
description: Includes the reparation of vessels, wooden ships, yachts, sports boats, fishing ships and boats…etc. also, re-building, renovation, full maintenance, including refitting or replacement of motors and parts.

name: Yachts Repairing and Maintenance Services
description: Includes the reparation of all kinds of yachts, such as, re-building, renovation, full maintenance, including refitting or replacement of motors and parts, as well as re-painting.

name: Ships and Boats Maintenance Services
description: Includes firms that carry out ships and boats maintenanceas regarding re-painting and cleaning, as well as other simple operations which do not include reparations or total maintenance, which are classified under Class 3512.

name: Boats Transport and Towing
description: Includes firms engaged in transporting power boats, sail boats and yachts for different purposes.

name: Dry Docks Operations
description: Includes shipyards equipped and developed to repair and refurbish different kinds of ships, including oil tankers, bulk carriers, containerships, ro-ro vessels, cargo vessels, gas carriers, chemical tankers, offshore vessels and rigs.

name: Navigation Aids Installation and Maintenance
description: Includes firms specialized in installing, maintaining and Removing of buoys, beacons and light houses, light vessel, navigational lights, automatic identification system , racons, moorings’ sinkers and anchor cables.

name: Non-Medical Resident Services
description: Includes providing permanent or temporary accommodation designated for the vulnerable individuals, who are in need of special care, support, or protection, such as, children, pregnant women, elderly people, malnourished people, and people who are ill or immunocompromised.

name: Social and Family Consultancy
description: includes firms specialized in offering a variety of social and family guidance services to families as regarding the area of social growth, assisting families in solving their problems, organizing workshops for dealing with family guidance and how to address children and adolescents problems..

name: Parents of Children with Disabilities Consultant
description: Includes providing counseling and support to the families of children who suffer disabilities on how to handle their children cases, as regarding , the right school and education , defining each case , scheduling diagnosis and re-evaluation , set goals for the children , assist the families in overcoming the psychological impact of having disabled children.

name: Speech and Language Disorders Center
description: Includes the centers engaged in providing training in language and speech and hearing enhancing for the children who suffer language and speech impediments.

name: Individualized Special Education Center
description: Includes the centers engaged in special education to rehabilitate mentally retarded and autistic children through individualized training sessions.

name: Protection from Abuse, Neglect and Exploitation Services
description: Includes providing protection services and taking measures to protect the health, well-being and rights of vulnerable individuals, which allow them, especially children, pregnant women, elderly people, malnourished people, and people who are ill or immunocompromised to live free from abuse, neglect, and exploitation.

name: Marriage Bureaux Services
description: Includes offices basically engaged in helping people find marriage partners, including setting up data base of the marriage seekers profiles and preferences, the role of such offices extend to coordinate the meeting between the parties and their families prior to the other marriage procedures which would be conducted by the families.

name: Elderly and People of Determination Personal Care Services
description: Includes providing personal care services and everyday tasks to the elderly and the physically disabled and the mentally impaired people, and who are unable to fully care for themselves, it involves the activities of daily living, such as dressing, bathing, feeding, toileting and incontinence care, laundry, meal preparation, hairdressing and other beauty treatment, also, providing day care of infants or children for helping mothers.

name: Special purpose Firm
description: This is a firm established to practice specific business as per the prevailing regulations.

name: Sport Research and Consultancies
description: Includes the provision of advice and assistance to sport clubs and organizations on organizational and development issues, such as strategic planning, financial planning and budgeting, marketing and advertising objectives and policies, sport psychology, human resources policies.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Diving Services
description: Includes firms which undertake underwater examination of pipelines, concrete or other scientific or practical applications. The activity of any such firm must be limited to said service, and not a part of other major operations undertaken by firms operating in the fields of offshore oilfields or marine contracting works.

name: Lifeguard Services
description: Includes providing qualified swimmers, trained and certified to work as swimmers’ rescuers, whether in swimming pools, beaches or water parks.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Equestrian Institute
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of equestrian, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of courts to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Ice Skating Training
description: Includes firms specialized in providing off and on ice skating training for beginners to acquire the basic skills of skating , as well as offering sessions for advanced levels on ice dance or ice hokey, whether for entertainment or contests.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Sport Academy
description: Includes sports institutions engaged in enhancing sporting performance and qualify sportsmen for regional and international sport excellence, through applying education on the latest advances in sports science, also, is to set up world class sports facilities involving courts and tracks, gyms, swimming pools, sport labs, coach training, lecture theater, organizing sports activities.

name: Football Training
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of football, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of courts to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Yoga Center
description: Includes firms engaged in yoga instructions and practices to enable yogins through physical postures alleviate health problems, reduce stress and make the spine supple in contemporary times, also to use as a complete exercise program and physical therapy routine.

name: Personal Sport Coaching Services
description: Includes firms providing fitness and athletic performance training and coaching to individual clients, on a standalone basis or in in a group, at the client’s own residence, at licensed premises such as hotels, gyms, sports facilities and health clubs as well as public areas deemed suitable for the purpose, it involves also coaching and training clients in all the complementary aspects of wellness and wellbeing as well as nutrition guidelines.

name: Boating and Yachting Training Institute
description: Includes firms specialized in conducting theoretical and practical sailing training to enable acquire the skills for driving boats and yachts.

name: Sport Tournaments Organizing Services
description: Includes firms which organize sports, races and tournaments and subsequently conduct contacts with the international and local sports associations, sports teams or sportsmen, enroll sportsmen, set tournament schedules, prepare grounds or courts, supervise championships, monitor results, give trophies.

name: Auto Racetrack
description: Includes the motorsport venue for hosting local races and the grand prix (formula), it’s designed to have several tracks, mainly the grand prix circuit and high speed test circuit, the grandstands are laid out to enable spectators to view all the stages of the race as well as securing spectators safety.

name: Skating Rrink
description: Includes iced arenas installed in hotels and shopping malls or outdoor arenas, covered with mechanically frozen ice to allow for entertainment skating or for ice hockey contests, including offering skating equipment for rental.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Recreational Course Operator
description: Includes firms licensed and permitted by the competent authority to operate the recreational course and supervise motorcycle riding therein.

name: Sports and Recreational Club
description: Includes clubs which have facilities to practice a number of sports and entertainment activities such as rowing, sailing, driving powerboats, ground tennis, driving sport cars, polo, swimming etc. These facilities are restricted to members against periodical subscriptions or fixed fees.
authority: Dubai Sports Council approval is required, Security Industry Regulatory Corporation

name: Water Sports Training Services
description: Includes firms specialized in water sports instruction, such as, jet ski, shawahevs, fast wooden boats, sailboats, rowing, sailing, windsurfing, water skiing, remote control boats and fishing.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Bowling Club
description: Includes sports institutions dedicated to bowling training through applying the latest theoretical and practical techniques to optimizing sporting performance and qualify players for regional and international sport excellence, the process involves emphasizing the physical, skills improving, knowledge and psychological aspects, these firms should set up the facilities that enable conducting the training.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Chess Club
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of Chess, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves the operation of the equipped sports facilities to allow for playing chess.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Hockey Club
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of hockey, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves the operation of fields to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Cricket Club
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of cricketl, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves the operation of the equipped sports facilities to allow for exercising these sports.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Martial Arts Club
description: Includes clubs and training centers specialized in one or more of the self-defense arts such as karate, judo, taekwondo, and kung fu, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of the equipped sports facilities to allow for exercising these sports, , such firms are allowed to sell the activity-related materials in non-commercial quantities
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Body Building Club
description: Includes firms specialized in the training of bodybuilding in order to control and develop one's musculature for aesthetic purposes, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of the equipped sports facilities to allow for exercising these sports, such firms are allowed to sell the activity-related materials in non-commercial quantities
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Falconry Club
description: Includes the clubs whose members’ interests centre on taking up the sport of falconry and dedicate themselves to the preservation of the ancient art of falconry and the conservation of birds of prey, it involves instruction in how to keep and handle hawks, falconry training.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports, Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Equestrian Club
description: Includes sports institutions dedicated to horse riding training through applying the latest theoretical and practical techniques to optimizing sporting performance and qualify equestrians for regional and international sport excellence, the process involves emphasizing the physical, skills improving, knowledge and psychological aspects, these firms should set up the facilities that enable conducting the training
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports, Public Health Services Department - Dubai Municipality

name: Men Physical Fitness Club
description: Includes firms specialized in the training of physical fitness for men in order to secure fitness and lose weight, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of the equipped sports facilities to allow for exercising these sports, , such firms are allowed to sell the activity-related materials in non-commercial quantities

name: Ladies Physical Fitness Club
description: Includes firms specialized in the training of physical fitness for women in order to secure fitness and lose weight, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of the equipped sports facilities to allow for exercising these sports, , such firms are allowed to sell the activity-related materials in non-commercial quantities.

name: Boxing Club
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of boxing, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves the operation of boxing rings to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Wrestling Training
description: Includes firms specialized in wrestling coaching inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves the operation of the equipped sports facilities to allow for exercising wrestling.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Golf Club
description: Includes sport clubs licensed by competent authorities and which accommodate sport facilities for exercising golf in order to optimize trainees performance and qualify regional and international sport excellence.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Football Club
description: Includes sport clubs licensed by competent authorities and which accommodate sport facilities for playing football, and is play in local, regional and international competitions with amateur or professional athletes.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Basketball Training
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of basketball, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of courts to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Tennis Training Services
description: Includes sports institutions dedicated to tennis training through applying the latest theoretical and practical techniques to optimizing sporting performance and qualify players for regional and international sport excellence, the process involves emphasizing the physical, skills improving, knowledge and psychological aspects, these firms should set up the facilities that enable conducting the training.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Polo Club
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of polo, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves the operation of fields to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Parachuting Club
description: Includes firms specialized in the theoretical and practical instructio, parachuting, It involves the operation of facilities that allow for exercising such sports..
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Diving and Snorkeling Club
description: Includes sports clubs dedicated to diving and snorkeling training through applying the latest theoretical and practical techniques to optimizing sporting performance and qualify sportsmen for regional and international sport excellence, the process involves emphasizing the physical, skills improving, knowledge and psychological aspects, these firms should set up the facilities that enable conducting the training.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Swimming Training Services
description: Includes sports institutions dedicated to swimming training through applying the latest theoretical and practical techniques to optimizing sporting performance and qualify sportsmen for regional and international sport excellence, the process involves emphasizing the physical, skills improving, knowledge and psychological aspects, these firms should set up the facilities that enable conducting the training.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Gymnastics Club
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of gymnastics, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves the operation of gymnastics arena to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Motorcycle Club
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of motorcycles sports, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves the operation of the equipped sports facilities to allow for exercising motorcycle sports.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Shooting Training
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of shooting using various types of ranged weapons, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves the operation of the equipped sports facilities to allow for exercising such sports
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Squash Training
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of squash, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of courts to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Rugby Football Training
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of rugby football, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves the operation of the equipped sports facilities to allow for exercising such sports.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Volleyball Training
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of volleyball, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of courts to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Jiu Jitsu club
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of Jiu jitsu, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of courts to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Ping Pong Training
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of Ping pong, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of courts to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Baseball Training
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of baseball, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of courts to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Badminton Training
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of badminton, whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, it involves the operation of courts to allow for exercising such sport.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: American Football Training
description: Includes firms specialized in the instruction of American football , whether inside the firm’s own facility or elsewhere, It involves the operation of the equipped sports facilities to allow for exercising such sports
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Aviation Club
description: Includes firms aim at promoting aeronautical sciences and to encourage the participation of members practice sky sports and leisure flying such as gliding, paramotoring, remote-controlled aircrafts operation, parachuting.

name: Sports Broker
description: This covers facilities approved by official and international authorities as a broker for football players and clubs aiming to provide best offers and deals negotiate and sign transfer or secondment contracts with clubs. This also covers fostering interests of players and representing them before sports, local and international bodies.

name: Players' Agent
description: Includes firms licensed by the competent local and international sport authorities to act as sports agent, including promoting and marketing athletes’ careers and securing them the best deals, negotiating employment, contract signing with clubs and sponsors, generally, to represent and look after the athletes’ interests before local and international sport authorities.

name: Ski Dome
description: Includes a winter sports complex in a dome like structure to house an artificial snow - making system , it contains slopes, ski areas, children winter village, as well as skiing requisites rental.
authority: General Authority for Youth and Sports

name: Sport and Recreational Events Tickets Selling
description: Includes firms engaged in selling the tickets of sport and recreational events on behalf of their organizers, whether the sale made in the place of the event or in any other place, as well as online, it involves providing the equipment to organize audience entry and computing.

name: Sport Training
description: Includes firms engaged enhancing sportsmen physical conditions, as well as raising the level of physical fitness as regarding speed, flexibility and endurance, as being the basic elements for practicing sport activities, such as football etc

name: Observation Decks
description: Includes observatory decks or platforms located upon a tall architectural structure or natural feature, where visitors can enjoy 36o degree view, also, telescopes are positioned to provide different views.

name: Jet Ski Rental
description: Includes renting personal watercraft used water recreational activities and sport.

name: Electric Bicycles Rental
description: Includes renting the electric powered bicycles with two or more wheels, electric scooters are not involved.

name: Off Road Motorcycles Rental
description: Includes firms licensed to engage in renting recreational motorbikes, with two wheels or more, fitted with motors, but not designed as vehicles or karts and are intended for mountains and off road use.

name: Watersports Equipment Rental
description: Includes firms engaged in renting watersport equipment for sport facilities and individuals, such as, diving devices, surf boards, windsurfs…etc

name: Electric Scooters Rental
description: Includes renting the two or three-wheeled electric scooters equipped with electric motor to produce power and without a seat.

name: Leisure and Sport Equipment Rental
description: Includes firms engaged in renting leisure and sports equipment and instruments used by clubs, gyms and individuals for practising sports and leisure activities.

name: Off Road Karts Rental
description: Includes renting and leasing the three or four wheeled vehicles which run by petrol and used for recreation and sport.

name: Hunting Requisites Trading
description: Includes reselling of fishing, nets, threads, hooks and rods, as well as animal hunting rifles, ammunition, nets, traps, bows, arrows and others, beside falcon breeders and training requisites.

name: Racing Cars Rental
description: Includes renting different racing cars without drivers to be exclusively restricted to racing tracks.

name: Bicycles Rental
description: Includes firms engaged in renting bicycles, fitted with two wheels or more, non-motorized, and are intended for leisure and sports use.

name: Sport Equipment Trading
description: Includes reselling fixed sports equipment to perform various exercises, such as, running and walking treadmill, tennis tables, nets, spears and poles, water sports equipment, such as, diving, skiing or sailing, as well as winners’ trophies, such as, cups, medals, shields cups, medals, such firms are allowed to carry out repair and maintenance services for the equipment they deal in.

name: Camping Requisites Trading
description: Includes reselling of camping and picnics food and beverage preserving utensils, lightening, tents, linen, clothes, shoes, kits and other requisites usually used in camping and picnics.

name: Bicycles and Spare Parts Trading
description: Includes reselling the two or three wheeled bicycles used for recreation, transportation, racing and as children's toys, such firms are allowed to carry out the repair and maintenance services

name: Fishing Tackles Trading
description: Include reselling the gear and equipment for catching fish and other aquatic animals, such as, nets, filaments, baits, hooks, nets, reels, rods accessories, fish finders …etc

name: Horse Equestrian Equipment and Requisites Trading
description: Includes reselling of saddles, reins and other horse riding accessories, also, breeding, training, feeding and caring related requisites other than uniforms.

name: Sports Wear Trading
description: Includes reselling sportswear for exercising sports, including socks, shoes, hats, gloves, balls, bags and training suits.

name: Animals and Birds Requisites Trading
description: Includes reselling animals’ accessories, such as, saddles, reins for horses and camels and other, involving veils, stands, straps and gloves for breeding falcons and training, pets requisites, such as, leashes, beds, crates, grooming tools …etc.

name: Children Games and Baby Care Requisites Rental
description: Includes renting children rides and games including swings, slides, house and aircraft models, whether made of solid and safe materials or of inflatable objects, also, new-born cradles, chairs, beds, walkers, prams, baskets, linen and covers.

name: Books Trading
description: Includes reselling different knowledge books in different languages..

name: Newspapers and Magazines Trading
description: Includes reselling of newspapers, magazines, directories, catalogues and other specialized publications used for promoting fashions, furniture, interior designs, household items and others.

name: Educational Aids Trading
description: Includes reselling the devices used by a teacher to clarify a subject, including drawings, Shapes, maps, samples, puzzles, mathematics and alphabets resources..etc.

name: Stationery Trading
description: Includes reselling stationery, such as copying and writing paper, notebooks, record books, various types of pens and pencils, rulers, sharpeners, paper perforators, paper clipping requisites, ready stamps, typewriters ribbons and other stationery materials, also, drawing requisites including geometrical drawing pencils, decorative pens, rulers, triangular rulers, colors, color pencils, ink, drawing paper and others.

name: Advertising Requisites Trading
description: Includes reselling indoor and outdoor advertising requisites like boards, electric and non-electric signs as well as promotional gifts and similar items.

name: Invitation and Greeting Cards Trading
description: Includes reselling the cards exchanged by individuals on special occasions to feature an expression of friendship or other sentiments or to convey thanks, it involves invitation cards for different occasions and events.

name: Multi-Dimensional Images Trading (HOLOGRAM)
description: Includes firms that supply other concerns with multi-dimensional imaged posters, pictures and stamps as per their commercial and professional requirements, these firms are not involved in the production process, but by specialized printing houses which are classified under No. 2221-08.

name: Pens and Writing Instruments Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing different kinds of pens, fountain pens, ball-point pens, and pencils as well as other writing instruments used in drawing and engraving.

name: Stamps Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing rubber, wood, steel stamps which are used primarily to authenticate documents and products.

name: Aluminum Alloy Hardener Tablets Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing hardeners in the form of tablets by blending various metal powders such as copper, Iron, aluminum, manganese in required ratios and then to compress the blended powder in Pelleter, these tablets will be melted with pure aluminum or scrap aluminum alloy to produce aluminum base alloys.

name: Hand Tools Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of hand tools used in agriculture, landscaping, construction, carpentry, smithery, plumbery and auto workshops, among such tools are rasps, hammers, chisels, shovels and others.

name: Cutting and Shearing Tools Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing household or workshop cutting and shearing hand tools, such as knives, scissors or other sharp edge tools, mainly axes, chisels, rasps, saws and others.

name: Locks and Keys Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the mechanical or electronic fastening devices as well as the keys, keycards, fingerprints and security tokens which release them.

name: Bolts, Nuts, Screws and Nails Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing holding tools such as nails, bolts, screws , pins and others, as well as requisites, such as nuts, fixing rings and anti-friction pads.

name: Grinding and Scraping Requisites Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing tools and materials to scrape, polish and smooth surfaces, these tools include sandpapers, smoothing stone and polishing heads fitted on polishing devices, except chemicals that are listed under class 2424.

name: Steel Fabrication and Welding Workshop
description: Includes the workshops involved in the fabrication of a variety of metal products by cutting, bending, and assembling processes, including metal frameworks or skeletons for construction, industrial frameworks in metal…etc

name: Lathe Workshop
description: Includes workshops with lathes designed to machine metals.

name: Metal Grating Manufacturing
description: Includes making steel and aluminum mesh by cutting and melting to use in industrial complexes floors and staircases, in balcony and stairs handrails, also the requisites like supports, bolts, angles and handles.

name: Fire Resistant and Retardant Materials Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing fire resistant and retardant cladding and insulation materials, partitions, bricks, paints.

name: Copper Rod Casting
description: Includes producing pure copper from it's primary ore (cathode) , then melt and cast to form rods to use in manufacturing cables.

name: Reinforcement Steel Bars Fabrication
description: Includes the process of cutting stainless steel and malleable steel bars in different sizes and forms to produce cylindrical shapes, columns or nets used in reinforcing of buildings, constructions and other ferroconcrete works.

name: Structures and Structural Steel Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing steel structures for building and construction purposes such as structural steel used in constructing bridges, tunnels and communication and energy transfer towers.

name: Steel Hangars and Sheds Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of prefabricated buildings and steel structures used as factories, warehouses, airplanes hangars, sheds and other buildings and constructions. It also includes other related operations and materials transportation to work sites.

name: Building Metal Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing all types of buildings and commercial stores metallic requisites, such as doors, windows, display windows, gardens and balconies metallic staircases fences, decor and interior design requisites, curtains, gates, overhead tanks, window grids bars, manhole covers, cables and wires containers, handrails, made of iron, aluminum, copper or other metals by die-casting or cutting panels and parts to form and shape the required designs.

name: Rigs and Oilfield Platform Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing metal and concrete offshore oil platform to extract and process oil and natural gas from offshore oilfields, these platforms usually contain facilities to house the workforce, they are either built on artificial islands, floating or fixed to the ocean.

name: Scaffolds and Ladders Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing temporary frames of metal pipes or other materials, used to support people and materials in the constructions or repair of buildings, also attic ladder, bridge ladder, cat ladder, Extension ladder , fixed and ladders portable.

name: Metal False Ceilings Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing aluminum and galvanized steel false ceilings to work as acoustic and heat isolators as well as decorative.

name: Expanded Metal Components Manufacturing.
description: Includes the process of metal spreading, boring or converting metal plates into gabions nets to produce metal products like reinforcing angles, sections, bricks lining up studs and other requisites used in the constructions for supporting and reinforcing different building elements and prevent cracking.

name: Metal Doors and Windows Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing steel, aluminum and cooper doors and windows and accessories, whether traditionally styled or bullet and blast resistant styles, frames from the same materials are included.

name: Building Stainless Steel Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing all types of buildings and commercial facilities made of stainless steel, such as doors, windows, display windows, gardens and balconies metallic staircases fences, decor and interior design requisites.

name: Ironmongery Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing vertical or horizontal turning knobs and screw hinges, door and window locks, and others metallic requisites made of copper, aluminum, steel or others.

name: Insulation Metal Panels Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing metal panels for proofing heat, humidifying, sounds, for fixing in cold storage compartments, refrigerated trailers, furnaces, pre-fabricated houses, factories.

name: Modular Fabrication and Assembly
description: Includes fabricating and assembling components of modules in workshops and then transporting to the construction site where they will be located in order to use for MEP services within a building, such as air conditioning ductwork, pipework, electrical containment, wiring, plumbing pipe and insulation.

name: Aerial photography services
description: Includes firms which provide aerial photography services, satellite imagery, and related services, in addition to collection of their data including preparation of aerial photos and related non-engineering services, these firms may use the Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS).

name: Photography Services
description: Includes firms that produce photographs for personal purposes, whether inside or outside private studios, such as the production of personal photos, as well as photographing weddings, parties and personal events, also, photographing and producing video-based virtual tours of real estate and various locations.

name: Photographs and Motion Pictures Processing
description: Includes laboratories specialized in processing photographic films and personal motion pictures (Commercial activities listed under class 9211) - alongwith developing and printing this activity also includes enlarging the pictures.

name: Films and Photography Materials Trading
description: Includes reselling photographic materials like films, discs, chips and others.

name: Specialized Photographic Equipment and Processing Materials Trading
description: Includes reselling films, chips, sheets, discs of radiography and photogrammetry as well as processing chemicals and photo papers.

name: wholesale Supermarket
description: Includes wholesale commercial complexes involved in marketing consumer fresh, preserved and canned foodstuff, household utensils and tools, detergents and other consumer goods for personal use, this activity should be licensed in warehouses only.

name: Supermarket
description: Includes commercial complexes involved in marketing consumer fresh, preserved and canned foodstuff, household utensils and tools, detergents and other consumer goods for personal use.

name: Blacksmith and Welding Works
description: Includes smithery, welding, and turnery small workshops.

name: Welding Bars Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing welding bars of lead and pewter alloys which have low melting points.

name: Goldsmith
description: Includes small workshops specialized in working with and repair precious metals.

name: Carpentry
description: Includes small carpentry workshops whose activities are limited to making household and personal items as well as producing simple wooden products.

name: Metal Doors, Windows Making and Fixing
description: Includes small workshops engaged in making metal doors and windows by cutting angles, metal panels and glass, as small scale process. Manufacturing such under contracts for construction works is listed under activity number 2811-05.

name: Disinfecting Booths Fabrication
description: Includes fabricating disinfecting booths from aluminum or glass, in order to install in different places to disinfect all individuals and vehicles entering and exiting the area

name: Metal Tanks and Containers Repairing
description: Includes repairing containers of metal for storage and transportation of water, petroleum products, chemicals and other liquids.

name: Cargo Containers Repairing and Maintenance
description: Includes repairing and maintaining different dimensions containers used for storing and transporting freight.

name: Scaffolding and Formwork Repairing
description: Includes using different techniques to repair and maintain scaffolding, used to support people and materials in the constructions or repair of buildings, also, the formwork for pouring concrete in construction.

name: Anti-Corrosion Services
description: Includes workshops engaged in removing rust and polishing tools and utensils made of silver or copper, also, carrying out rust removal from structural steel and marine equipment as well as provision of anti-corrosion services.

name: Silversmith
description: Includes making of silversmiths’ articles, such as brooches, earnings, necklaces, bracelets, rings from silver.

name: Tents , Sheds and Tarpaulins Trading
description: Includes reselling tents and temporary and permanent sheds made of textiles or plastic and designed to be fixed in shops or building or streets, in order to protect against sun and rain, also, covers and tarpaulin for covering outdoor or transported cargo or for covering cars, it involves fixing these products said places.

name: Sewing Yarn Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing yarn from natural or synthetic fibers for using in hand or machine sewing, crocheting, knitting or embroidery.

name: Lace and Crochet Manufacturing
description: Includes the process of weaving lace from natural and artificial yarns and fibers. It also includes the manufacture of other similar woven products such as crochet, brocades, woven belts, as well as ready made garment requisites such as cards, labels, brands, tapestry and others.

name: Yarn, Textiles Dyeing and Processing
description: Includes dyeing and preparing sewing yarns for tailoring ready-made garments. Besides dyeing of textiles, cotton and wool fabrics and others, it includes preparing, cutting, tailoring and sewing to manufacture ready-made garments.

name: Cotton, Wool Spinning and Weaving
description: Includes the preparation of cotton and wool fibers manufactured from substitute materials such as nylon or artificial silk, carrying out spinning operations including cleaning and carding...etc. Also includes spinning and weaving of fibers to produce fabrics, textiles, broad-cloth, embroideries and laced fabrics, as well as their bleaching.

name: Tents, Awnings and Tarpaulin Manufacturing
description: Includes making tents and awnings to use as shade from the sun in or protecting from rain in shops and buildings, also, covers and tarpaulin used to cover goods stored in open air or transported in vehicles.

name: Fabrics Textiles Embroidering
description: Includes knitting and crocheting cotton, silk and wool fabrics with colored or golden stripes to use in producing household linens and women dress.

name: Flags Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of formal and informal flags and banners with different sizes for different purposes by means of cutting and weaving or by color printing or others. It also includes the manufacture of logos and badges as well as ceremonial banners which are hung at celebrations and similar occasions. This also includes the manufacture of flags woven from natural or artificial fibers or from plastic and the like.

name: Marine Protection and Demarcation Products Manufacturing
description: Includes firms engaged in making the products that are used to protect marine environment from fabrics and plastic, such as, silt curtains to contain dredging silt and turbidity, oil booms for oil spills and chemicals, debris barriers for rubbish and seaweeds, it also involves demarcation barriers for designating swimming and boating areas and for protection from jellyfish, as well as navigation buoys and beacons to identify navigation channels.

name: Fabrics, Textiles and Readymade Garments Screen Printing
description: Includes silk-screen printing on textiles and wearing apparel by transferring a multicolored image or design image from a screen to textile articles through lithographic, gravure, screen or flexographic printing.

name: Face Masks and Gloves Preparation
description: Includes preparing of face masks and respirators and gloves intended for protection against particles and viruses, this activity involves the firms that use substances and tools as well as a volume of output that do not amount to manufacturing process.

name: Youth Hostels
description: Includes firms providing of inexpensive lodging places for travelling young people while visiting Dubai, such places might accommodate facilities to enable them practice cultural, social and sport activities which help in enhancing and developing better understanding between them.
authority: NOC from the Department of Tourism

name: Vacation Homes Rental
description: Includes offering owned or rented furnished accommodation for renting to vacationers on a daily, weekly, monthly or annual basis, it involves renting the unit as a whole and not partially as rooms or beds.
authority: NOC from the Department of Tourism

name: Pre-Fabricated Houses Rental
description: Includes renting and leasing pre-fabricated buildings entirely or partly made of wood, or other materials, to use as offices or food courts or first aid clinics.

name: Tobacco and Cigarettes Trading
description: Includes reselling of processed and prepared tobacco for smoking, as well as cigarettes, cigars, pipe tobacco, shisha tobacco, electrically heated tobacco rolls, such products must be manufactured and packed according to the terms and conditions and specifications of the competent authorities and as per the prevailing respective law, the activity should not be given to shops and commercial centers located in residential neighborhoods.
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Cigarettes Selling
description: Includes selling cigarettes in groceries and supermarkets, such products must be manufactured and packed according to the terms and conditions and specifications of the competent authorities and as per the prevailing respective law.
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Tobacco Trading
description: Includes reselling crude or dried tobacco leaves before making any other converting process.
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Electronic Cigarettes and Accessories Trading
description: Includes reselling electronic cigarettes which are electronic devices that work by heating a liquid called e-juice which generates vapor that is inhaled by the user, the e-juice may or not contain nicotine, e-cigarette is intended to simulate the experience of smoking cigarettes and narghiles and may help users to quit smoking.
authority: General Health and Safety Department (Dubai Municipality)

name: Smoking and Tobacco Heating Devices Trading
description: Includes reselling of smoking pipes, pipe holders, narghiles (water pipe), lighters, ash trays, match boxes, tobacco boxes and other smokers’ requisites also, it involves narghiles renting, also, the devices for electrically heating rolled or powdered tobacco by thermal contact in order to inhale and exhale it to simulate smoking, the activity should not be given to shops and commercial centers located in residential neighborhoods.

name: Leisure Yachts and Boats Rental
description: Includes firms which hire out boats, small vessels and fully equipped yachts for individuals or tourist groups for sightseeing inside the cities or from one to another, through launching irregular trips. This does not include overnight Accommodation.

name: Marine Tours Operation
description: Includes firms which organize leisure cruising in the city waterways or between cities to individuals and tourist groups for marine discovery tours, sport and recreational fishing, diving, whale watching and dolphin…etc

name: Hotel
description: Is a facility that, based on it’s rating, offers upscale accommodations and superior service, in-room media amenities, full service accommodations offer diverse on-site eateries ranging from fine dining to casual dining and 24-hour room service, guests access to concierge services, an on-site fitness facility and on-site pool.
authority: NOC from the Department of Tourism

name: Guest House
description: Includes firms which offer furnished rooms to persons who are interested in temporary accommodation on the basis of daily rent and fixed prices. The role of such firms is limited to residence provision only excluding such services usually provided by hotels.
authority: NOC from the Department of Tourism

name: Hotel Apartments Rental
description: Includes firms which furnish residential apartments with all requisites and means necessary for residential purposes. Such apartments are leased for relatively long periods in return for monthly or annual rent.
authority: NOC from the Department of Tourism

name: Floating Hotel
description: Includes residence services provided on board ships or vessels equipped with the necessary requisites for residents, beside temporary short-term residence on board, such ships provide the usual hotel services.

name: Beach Club
description: Includes tourist facilities situated on beaches or small islands, on built facilities or chalets or sheds, to enjoy entertainment and sport activities during holidays, including, boating, jet skiing, cycling, sailing, water skiing, surfing, diving, kids entertainment, barbeque grills, as well as restaurant and cafes
authority: The approval of the Dubai City Authority - electronic

name: Resort
description: Includes firms specialized in providing accommodation facilities, including beach cabins and flats for a short-stay in tourist destinations whether in beaches or mountains, beside a suitable accommodation, which may be taken on rental or on daily charge bases, all other tourist services are provided.
authority: NOC from the Department of Tourism

name: Economy Hotel
description: Includes hotels that offer a very limited amount of on-site amenities and often only offer basic accommodations with little to no services.
authority: NOC from the Department of Tourism

name: University Dormitory
description: Includes firms which provide furnished residential quarters for large numbers of students and also has extra amenities such study and dining rooms, kitchen facilities, recreation rooms, gym, Internet and TV facilities.
authority: NOC from the Department of Tourism

name: Floating Restaurant
description: Includes ships, boats or yachts suitably equipped for dining on board, including serving the food and beverages while the ship is anchoring or on entertainment cruise.

name: Floating Coffee Shop
